Only then can it live up to the name of the university's Chinese language curriculum and conform to the school's fine tradition of emphasizing practical application.Depending on the choice of the instructor, the courses can be divided into two categories.1. Literature: Focus on the deepening of literary taste, language sensitivity, literary creativity and practical creativity.2. Thinking category: Focus on the improvement of critical thinking ability, logical deduction ability, decision ability, organizational integration ability, discussion ability and character practice ability.It is hoped that through the cultivation and training of these two aspects, we will develop a brilliant three lives for the future survival, life and life of students.

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1. 極限與連續，2. 導數及其應用，3. 不定積分與定積分，4. 超越函數及其反函數，5. 積分法則，6. 不定型與瑕積分，7. 定積分的應用，8. 空間幾何與向量微積分，9. 偏導數，10. 重積分。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration.

description.zh: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
description.en: The course is designed for the students with engineering background. The theme of this course is to encourage students to participate in the discovery of laws and wonder of nature, and to solidate the foundation for the particular courses of study for different departments. The contents of this course include mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, electromagnetics, optics, and foundation of modern physics, etc.. The lecturers will emphasize or abridge certain contents based on the individual needs of departments. For this course, there will be 3 credits for each of two semesters,  and 3 lecture hours per week.

description.zh: 依據提供服務準則，工程師們須以誠實公平公正正當和奉獻保護公共健康，安全及幸福。工程師們必須以專業標準的行為履行最高的倫理準則。本課程以（1）工程倫理概述（2）衝突與抉擇（3）守則與解說（4）個案分析，提供學生瞭解及研析。
description.en: Accordingly, the services provided by engineers require honesty, impartiality, fairness, and equity and must be dedicated to protection of the public health, safety and welfare. Engineers must perform under a standard of professional behavior that require adherence to the highest principles of ethical conduct. This course offers (1).Description of engineering ethics (2).Conflict and selection (3).Rule and explanation (4).Case study for student studied.

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1. 極限與連續，2. 導數及其應用，3. 不定積分與定積分，4. 超越函數及其反函數，5. 積分法則，6. 不定型與瑕積分，7. 定積分的應用，8. 空間幾何與向量微積分，9. 偏導數，10. 重積分。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration.

notes: 桃分署上課；場地因素，該班僅提供能源系同學上課

description.zh: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
description.en: The course is designed for the students with engineering background. The theme of this course is to encourage students to participate in the discovery of laws and wonder of nature, and to solidate the foundation for the particular courses of study for different departments. The contents of this course include mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, electromagnetics, optics, and foundation of modern physics, etc.. The lecturers will emphasize or abridge certain contents based on the individual needs of departments. For this course, there will be 3 credits for each of two semesters,  and 3 lecture hours per week.

notes: 桃分署上課；場地因素，該班僅提供能源系同學上課

description.zh: 教授電腦工程繪圖基礎，包括立體三維空間的投影觀念、幾何學製圖方法，訓練繪製草圖、各種物件之三視圖；並能正確標註尺寸，公差與配合，使具備繪製各式管路、鋼架、氣油壓及機械設備之相關標準工程圖的能力。
description.en: Instructing the basis of computer engineering drawing, including the concepts of orthographic projection of 3D space and the methods of geometry graphics. Training the skills to raw sketch, various 3D views. Learning to mark dimensions, tolerance and fittings correctly. This lesson also demands students to able to be familiarized the drawings of steel structures, hydraulic and fluid systems, and related mechanical devices.

description.zh: 內容包括各種能量形式、能源轉換、物質之熱力性質、熱力學第一定律。 冷凍與熱泵系統之熱力循環與實驗。
description.en: Analysis of energy systems, energy forms, energy transformation, properties of substance and first law of thermodynamics. Experiments of refrigeration and heat pump cycles.

description.zh: 管路處理、焊接設備及焊接練習、空氣性質測定、冷媒性質測定、基本冷凍循環實習、冷凍系統處理、基本冷凍機電路實習、基本冷凍系統組件之配置。
description.en: To familiarize students with practice of working with tubing, using with oxyacetylene brazing equipment, air properties measurement, identifying refrigerant by T-P curve, evacuating a system, charging and testing a system, wiring of basic electrical circuit and control circuit.

description.zh: 無塵室的應用、無塵室的基本系統、無塵室的基本設計、無塵室節能技術運用、無塵室廠務系統規劃
description.en: Application of clean room, basic structure of a clean room system, fundamental of clean room design, energy saving techniques for clean rooms, planning of clean room factory affairs.

description.zh: 中央空調系統基本設計理念、空調區之熱舒適理論與應用 、空調負荷計算 、風管系統設計、空調系統節能 、特殊空調系統規劃分析
description.en: Basic design concept for central air conditioning system, theory and application of thermal comfort of air condition zone, capacity calculation of air conditioner, piping system design, energy saving of air conditioning systems, planning and analysis of special air conditioning system.

description.zh: 車床、銑床、刨床、磨床、鉗工、鑄造、鍛造、鈑金、氣焊及電弧焊等實習。
description.en: Machining, Welding, Casting and Forging Shop Practice.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 研究生在教授的指導下，針對工業設計相關特定研究主題進行研究，並將研究成果寫成論文。其內容包括研究方法、理論分析及研究結果﹙含結論與建議﹚。本課程主要目的在提供學生開啟個人對於工業設計領域相關議題的獨立研究能力。因此，本課程將包含如何建構研究設計、寫作與參考文獻的能力。
description.en: Graduate students are required to complete specific research topic under the restriction of their advisor. The results should be written as a thesis. The thesis focuses on the fields in "industrial design", and includes research methodology, theory background and conclusive result or findings. The aims of this course are to provide students with opportunity to initiate personal research into industrial design related topic. Therefore, the course includes a training of developing research, writing and bibliographic skills.

notes: 碩二必修 (畢業前須修滿兩門論文)

description.zh: 碩士學位論文寫作
description.en: A student must write a thesis to fulfill the partial requirements for the Master degree.

description.zh: 研究生在第一年必須選定指導教授，以決定設計創作或論文寫作的方向，從事設計創作的研究生必須發展創作理念、創作過程與實作說明，最後彙整創作報告形同於研究論文；從事論文寫作的研究生針對互動媒體設計的相關主題進行研究，並將研究成果撰寫成為論文，其內容包含緒論、文獻探討、研究設計與實施、研究結果與討論、結論與建議等。本課程目的旨在培養獨立企劃研究能力，建構研究設計與研究寫作的能力，對設計創作組而言，過程中培養協同合作的能力是必須具備的要項。
description.en: In the first year graduate students are requested to determine design creation and research topic under the supervision of their advisor. Graduate students who are chosen the fields of design creation should be developed creation principle, design process and pr92tical work. The results of design creation are considered as research thesis. Graduate students who are focus on the research of inter92tive media design should be undertaken the results of research as a thesis. The content of thesis includes introduction, literature review, research design and appro92hes, results and discussion, conclusion and suggestions. The aims of this course are to provide students with opportunity to initiate personal research into industrial design related topic. The course includes a training of developing research, writing up and references. To design creation groups. The collaborative capability is in need of the cultivation of ability during the process.

notes: 碩二生上，下學期皆需選論文

description.zh: 論文寫作。
description.en: Thesis writing.

description.zh: 本課程主要在讓學生藉由規劃與實施一項公益活動，以實踐企業倫理與社會責任，並藉以思考在推展企業倫理、企業社會責任與公司治理等理念時，如何能落實於企業的體制之中，以建立一個永續發展的企業價值體系。
description.en: This course is designed to enable students to implement corporate ethics and social responsibility by planning and implementing a public welfare activity. The students should think about how to implement corporate ethics, corporate social responsibility, and corporate governance concepts. In order to establish a sustainable enterprise value system.

name.zh: 企業倫理與社會責任實踐
name.en: Corporate Ethics and Social Responsibility Practice

notes: 碩二必修，六 234，台北集中上課，USR 計畫，國際會議廳

description.zh: 論文寫作。
description.en: Thesis writing.

description.zh: 論文寫作。
description.en: Thesis writing.

description.zh: 論文寫作。
description.en: Thesis writing.

description.zh: 碩士學位論文寫作
description.en: A student must write a thesis to fulfill the partial requirements for the Master degree.

description.zh: 本課程的目的是協助研究生準備進行有關設計創造力開發、創意設計手法與設計方法論等主題之碩士論文研究或實務專題設計，提供各種理論工具與個案演練。課程內容包括 (1) 人工智慧、心理學、人類學和語言學等導向之設計創造力研究，以及 (2) 規則式與案例式推理、基模類比與聯想、產品俗民誌、模式語言和體驗劇本等創意設計手法演練。
description.en: The objective of this course is to help the graduate students whose topics of master's theses or graduate projects are related to creativity development, creative design skills and methodology, to prepare their preliminary studies. This course provides the necessary theoretical tools and case studies, and its contents contain (1) design creativity research based on artificial intelligence, psychology, anthropology and linguistics, as well as (2) exercises of creative design techniques: rule-based reasoning and case-based reasoning, schematic analogy and association, product ethnography, pattern language and experiential scenario.

description.zh: 微奈米量測工程技術為是現代科技發展之重要前瞻技術，它將探討有效尺寸在微奈米等級範圍之精密量測儀器與技術。本課程將涵括下列各項現代精密量測主題：1. 近代光電量測系統與技術 2. 量測統計原理 3. 量測信號處理 4. 三次元座標量測系統與技術 5. 雷射干涉系統與技術 6. 影像量測系統與技術 7. 微奈米量測系統與技術 - 干涉術、相位移術、調變術、光共焦 及   自動聚焦術 8. 微奈米量測系統與技術 -- 掃瞄探針顯微鏡 (SPM), STM, AFM 及   SNOM.9. 奈米粉體量測系統與技術 10. 量測實驗 11. 小型量測儀器之專題製作
description.en: This subject is arranged to introduce the advanced systems and technology associated with micro- and nano-scale measurement. The subject includes the following subtopics:1.Modern opto-electro measurement systems and techniques2.Statistic principles for measurement3.Signal processing techniques4.Three-dimensional measurement systems and techniques5.Laser interferometric metrology and systems6.Image processing techniques for metrology7.Micro and nano-measurement systems and techniques (I) -   Moire interferometry, phase shifting, signal modulation,   confocal and auto-focusing techniques.8.Micro- and nano-measurement systems and techniques (II) -   SPM, STM, AFM and SNOM.9.Nano-particle measurement systems and techniques10.Student laboratory/practices11.Team project work for design and fabrication of    small-scaled measurement instrument

name.zh: 微奈米量測系統與技術

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹最佳控制之相關原理與應用，內容包括如下：最佳控制簡介，性能指標，動態規劃法，變分法，變分法在最佳控制之應用，最佳控制之數值解與個案研究等。
description.en: English Description:  This subject is arranged to introduce the principles and applications of optimal control. The subject includes the following subtopics: introduction of optimal control, performance measure, dynamic programming, calculus of variations, variational approach to optimal control problems, numerical solution of optimal control, and case studies.

description.zh: 本課程在使學生認識嵌入式系統，瞭解其系統架構，並學習嵌入式系統之硬體與軟體之設計技術。內容包含：(1) 嵌入式系統介紹 (2) 嵌入式系統應用 (3) 嵌入式系統硬體 (4) 嵌入式系統軟體架構 (5) 中斷處理 (6) 記憶體管理 (7) 週邊應用 (8) 即時作業系統。
description.en: This course let students to understand the embedded system and learn the skill to design the hardware and software of embedded system.  The contents of this course are: (1)Embedded System Introduction, (2)Embedded System Application, (3)Embedded System Hardware, (4)Embedded System Software Architectures, (5)Interrupts, (6)Memory (7) Peripherals, (8)Real-Time Operating System.

name.zh: 嵌入式系統設計與應用

description.zh: 如何藉由商務模型的分析，建置數位化協同產品設計與開發環境，並說明資料管理、構型管隨著網路時代的來臨，不但造成數位化協同產品設計與開發觀念的興起，也造成數位化協同平台技術逐漸成熟，並且將同步工程觀念的實現更往前邁進一大步。本課程是從數位化協同產品設計與開發概念之介紹開始，使學生明白數位化協同產品設計與開發在現代製造業中的重要性，接著介紹理與工作流程管理等相關實務應用觀念。
description.en: Information and network technologies have promoted the traditional concurrent engineering to the next generation. The collaborative e-design and e-development concept has been more popular in industries. This course is introduced from the concept of collaborative product design and development to help students understanding the importance of collaborative e-design and e-development in modern industries. Furthermore, the business model analysis method is provided to construct the collaborative environment of e-design and e-development. In addition, some real cases of data management, configuration management, and workflow management are mentioned.

name.zh: 數位化設計與開發特論
name.en: Special Topics on e-Design and e-Development

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意介紹雷射加工之理論及實務，注重製程參數之研究，教導學生如何掌握製程，以達到精密製造的要求。內容包括雷射輔助製造程序、雷射加工設備、雷射加工原理、系統分析、實驗設計、雷射加工實例。
description.en: Introducing theory and practice of laser material processing. Emphasizing the study of manufacturing factors. Letting the students know how to control manufacturing process, and fulfill the demand of precision manufacturing. The course content is : laser assisted manufacturing processes, facilities for laser material processing, the principles of laser material processing, system analysis, examples of laser material processing.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意表面現象，介面反應等與近代高科技技術，如鍍膜工程，表面處理，腐蝕，磨潤，微機電，感測器，半導體技術等息息相關，且日益重要。表面分析是原子層次的相關研究，它包括振動，電子或離子頻譜分析，微技術等之應用。主要的項目包含，表面形貌觀察 (SEM, BSEM, AFM), 成份分析 ( 光譜分析，質譜分析，EDX ), 結構分析 ( XRD, AES, ESCA, XPS ), 鍵結分析 ( Raman 光譜，FTIR ), 表面粗糙度，膜厚，附著力，內應力等膜之特性分析。
description.en: Surface phenomena and processes occurring at interface are becoming increasingly important in a wide variety of industrial applications including the areas of films coating surface treatments, conclusion, triobology, microelectronics, sensors and semi-conductor technologies.  Accompanying this is an ever-growing need for surface characterization allowing better definition of processes occurring at a microscopic level.Surface analysis is the use of vibration, electron or ion spectroscopic and microscopic techniques for the study of material at the atomic level, it includesSEM, AFM, XRD, EDX, ESCA, XPS, AES, Raman Spectrum, and FTIR analysis.

description.zh: 本課程之目標為依人力職能需求，參考國內外之先行經驗，整合智能化生產所需之知識與技能訓練，以淬鍊出一套務實之智能化生產課程。本課程將涵蓋工業 4.0 - 智能化生產所需相關基礎技術之教學與實作課程，包括物聯網基礎技術與應用實例、雲端服務系統與資訊安全技術、巨量資料管理、分析、及應用實例、智慧化企業與工廠管理系統與應用、自動化與機器人技術及應用等等。
description.en: The goal of this course is to meet the needs of the manpower function, with reference to the previous experiences from domestic and abroad groups. This course will cover the topics related to the basic technology required for intelligent production, including the basic technology and application examples of the Internet of Things, the cloud service system and information security technology, the huge amount of data management, Intelligent enterprise and factory management systems and applications, automation and robot technology and applications, and so on.

description.zh: 本課程的主要目的在學習物流管理的基本觀念與應用。課程內容包括：(1) 物流管理基本概念、(2) 物流系統設計、(3) 物流資訊科技、(4) 物流運輸作業、(5) 存貨管理、(6) 倉儲作業、(7) 配送作業、(8) 物流委外管理、(9) 全球物流管理、(10) 永續物流管理。
description.en: This course will introduce basic concept and application of logistics management. The topics addressed in this course include: (1) Basic concept and application of logistics management, (2) Logistics system and network design, (3) Logistics information technology, (4) Transportation management, (5) Inventory management, (6) Warehouse management, (7) Distribution management, (8) Logistics outsourcing management, (9) Global logistics management, (10) Sustainable logistics management.

description.zh: 此課程旨在以使用者為中心的觀點，說明產品與服務之開發與設計相關概念，並以實作方式應用使用者研究的方法，收集、分析與呈現研究資料與成果，使學生具備使用者研究的執行與發表能力。
description.en: From the human-centered perspective, this course explains concepts about the development and design of products and services. By practicing user research methods, students will learn how to collect and analyze the data, and present the findings of user research.

description.zh: 本課程預計搭配中國工業工程學會的「永續工程師」證照檢定考試做授課，由工程面與管理面探討淨零排放趨勢下，企業永續下工業工程所需具備的能力與知識。其中管理篇包括：企業永續發展、永續發展與氣候變遷風險管理、碳中和浪潮與因應之道、綠色供應鏈管理、永續金融、氣候相關財務揭露建議、資源永續與產業共生、與永續經濟決策分析。工程篇則包括：永續供應鏈設計、永續與能源政策、排放權交易與碳定價、綠色產品設計與評估、綠色物流與綠色冷鏈、產品服務系統、綠色聰明生產與循環經濟、清潔生產等理論與案例實務。
description.en: This course is designed to cover the knowledge and skills required for sustainable industrial in the context of net-zero emissions. It will be taught in conjunction with the "Sustainable Engineer" certification exam of the Chinese Institute of Industrial Engineers. The course will explore the topics from both engineering and management perspectives, focusing on sustainable enterprise development. The management chapters will cover a range of areas such as climate change, sustainable finance, green supply chain, carbon-neutral strategies, climate-related financial disclosure, resource sustainability, and industrial symbiosis, as well as sustainable economic decision analysis. Meanwhile, the engineering chapters will delve into topics such as sustainable supply chain design, energy policies, carbon pricing, green product design and evaluation, green logistics, product-service systems, green smart production, circular economy, and clean production theories and case studies.

description.zh: 探討遊戲式數位學習之相關原理、設計、以及實務應用。內容包括遊戲式數位學習之優點、特性、限制、科技、媒體、設計與發展、系統、實際案例、未來趨勢等。
description.en: The course aims to explore advanced issues on game-based e-learning including its characteristics, advantages and limitations, technology and media involved, design and development, system and practical cases, and future trends, etc.

name.zh: 遊戲式數位學習專題研究

description.zh: 本課程旨在闡述專案工程規劃與控制之系統架構，主要介紹各種專案規劃與控制之方法及專案管理方法，內容包工程專案管理方法，專案工期規劃與控制，專案成本控制方法，專案資源管理，專案風險整合管理，專案品質管理，及專案人力及目標管理等介紹。
description.en: 英課名：Investigation engineering control        System framework of investigation engineering         control.        Investigation plan and period procedure arrange.        A method that rate of progress control.        Natural resources to allocate and the most suitable         schedule.        Cost accounting and cost control.        Complete cost/System control of time limit for a           project.

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹有關災害發生的種類，以及相對應的災害預防規劃，並探討各種風險發生之機會，以進一步研擬危機緊急處計畫，以落實災害防治與減害的功效。
description.en: This course  will introduce the category, of disaster and each related preventing design.For deriving emergency treatment plan, the theory of rick management will be also discussed.

name.en: Disaster Prevention Planning and Risk Management

description.zh: 1. 結構物劣化形態，介紹.2. 目視檢測與非破性檢測。3. 現況評估與分析。4. 維修與補強設計。
description.en: 1.Reterioration types of concrete structures. 2.Visual an Non-estructive inspection. 3.Conition Evaluation and Analysis. 4.Maintenance and Repair Design.

name.zh: 結構物檢測評估及補強

description.zh: 先修課程：3002010 或負責教授同意。晶體結構、鋼之變態、相平衡原理、退火與正常化、淬火與回火、表面硬化處理、構造用鋼、工具鋼、其它鋼料及鑄鐵之熱處理。
description.en: The contents of this course can be categorized as followings: 1. fundamental metallographic concepts.2. The effects of alloying elements in steel.3. Hardenability 4. General heat treatment processes: annealing, hardening, tempering, and normalizing. 5. Special heat treatment process : tool steels hardening and tempering. Quenching and tempering of constructional steels, case hardening, nitriding, carbonitriding, induction hardening, and flame hardening.

description.zh: 自動化機構運動及動力分析、控制理論與氣液壓學簡介、機構元件說明、馬達及感測器選用。
description.en: Kinematic and dynamic Analysis of automatic mechanisms, Control theorem, Introduction to pneumatics and Hydraulics,Mechanism elements, Selection of motors and sensors.

description.zh: 本課程將從不同的金融服務領域應用幫助同學瞭解數位金融的發展以及生成式 AI 於金融科技之應用。本課程之教學目標包括：(1) 人工智慧跨域應用金融產品企劃與數位行銷：掌握虛擬通路與實體通路的差異與整合應用，導入通用式人工智慧搭配合適的使用者介面與體驗設計；(2) 智慧金融科技素養與創新應用：關注大數據、雲端運算、物聯網與人工智慧的各種創新應用，並了解機器學習於資金管理之應用與人工智慧於量化交易之應用；(3) 生成式 AI 導入與開發：透過課程整合微軟 Azure Open AI 雲端服務資源，讓學生具有導入 ChatGPT 及聊天機器人開發能力，並連結創新創業課程建立明確創業目標，導入跨領域創業課程，養成專業職能和研發實力，進而了解金融產業在數位轉型中，所面臨的困難與挑戰。
description.en: 英文概述English Description 	This course will help students understand the development of digital finance and the application of generative AI in financial technology from different financial service applications. The objectives of this program include: (1) Financial product planning and digital marketing; (2) Intelligent financial technology literacy and innovative applications; (3) Generative AI Introduction and Development: Integrate Microsoft Azure Open AI cloud service resources through the course to provide students with the ability to introduce ChatGPT and chat robot development, and link to innovative entrepreneurship courses to establish clear entrepreneurial goals and introduce cross-disciplinary entrepreneurship courses to develop professional functions and R&D capabilities.

name.zh: 人工智慧跨域金融之應用

notes: 資財三甲乙、四甲乙合開 / 科研 240

description.zh: 本課程教授內容包括外匯理論與實務操作，課程內容包括： 1. 探討有那些因素會影響匯率的波動以及均衡匯率的決定，並以實務案例，引導學生得以學習到外匯交易的知識，並懂得結合外匯交易的理論與實務來建置自己的外匯交易策略，進行正確的外匯投資操作。2. 透過對外匯市場交易之思考、探討、批判與洞察，來打造最適合的外匯交易策略，進而提升外匯專業之操作能力。
description.en: This course prepares students to effectively analyze, assess, and trade foreign currency in the FOREX spot market. Topics presented during the course include: models of success and historical evidence on buying and selling patterns, how to understand volatility of return on the foreign currency exchange, the price behavior of currency, and technical tools for analysis including Japanese Candlesticks and Bar charts. The course focuses on foreign exchange market, major players in the FOREX market, spot and forward market, currency futures and options, foreign exchange exposure and risk, FOREX traders and trading, technical analysis in the FOREX market, profiles of the world’s major currencies and their characteristics. Students will also explore and use the various trading platforms in use on the spot market today and will complete a project in which they will maintain and trade a practice account over the length of this course and track their performance, trading behaviors, and motivat

name.en: Foreign Exchange Markets: Theories and Practices

notes: 【全英語】/ 資財三甲乙合開 / 科研 243

description.zh: 本課程旨在教授學生瞭解雲端環境及物聯網系統架構並進一步教授雲端環境及物聯網安全需求，課程內容除介紹雲端環境及物聯網系統的基本概念外，亦將由 OWASP 的雲端安全及物聯網安全的重點進行說明，培養學生有能力分析雲端及物聯網環境中的各式潛在安全威脅，並具備設計與實作具安全防護能力的雲端及物聯網系統。
description.en: This course aims to teach students to understand the cloud environment and IoT system architecture. Furthermore, the teach of the cloud environment and IoT security requirements are also introduced. In addition to introducing the basic concepts of cloud environment and IoT system, the course content will also include OWASP cloud security and IoT security. The main objective is on developing students' ability to analyze various potential security threats in the cloud and IoT environments, as well as cloud and IoT systems that are designed and implemented with security protection capabilities.

notes: 資財四甲乙、資財所合開

description.zh: 物聯網系統包含了感測器與感測網路，邊緣閘道，雲端服務與存取裝置，可建構眾多的端到端商業應用包含無人商店與智慧支付的場景金融，遠距醫療與照護，智慧製造與智慧家庭等。本課程將教授物聯網系統的設計包含裝置與服務的技術，並以各項商業應用場景做課題的探討。
description.en: The Internet of Things (IoT) system encompasses sensors and sensor networks, IoT gateways, cloud services, and mobile devices, enabling the development of numerous end-to-end business applications, including scenarios such as unmanned stores, and intelligent payment in the financial sector, remote healthcare and caregiving, smart manufacturing, and smart homes. This course will teach the design of IoT systems, including device and service technologies, and explore various business application scenarios as topics of discussion.

name.zh: 物聯網系統設計與商業應用
name.en: IoT System design and Business Application

notes: 【全英語】/ 資財四甲乙、資財所合開 / 科研 240

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意基本觀念及其領域、非線性代數之數值解法、聯立方程式之數值解、多項式內外插、微分、積分、常微分方程、起始、邊界值問題之數值解法。
description.en: Fundamental Concepts and Its Scope, Numerical Solution of Nonlinear Algebraic Equations and Sets of Equations, Interpolating Polynomials, Numerical Differentiation and Numerical Integration, Numerical Solution of Ordinary Differential Equations, Numerical Solution of Boundary-ValueProblems and Initial-Value Problems.

description.zh: 本課程著重於環境污染物之微量監測與分析內容，此包括有機有毒物、重金屬之儀器分析原理、化學理論及分析方法。修習本課程宜有化學基礎。
description.en: The course introduces monitoring and analysis for environment pollutants. It focuses the micro quantity analysis based on chemical theory. Modern instruments with high sensitivity will be also discussed.

name.en: Monitoring and Analysis for Environmental Pollutants

description.zh: 1. 電力電子元件的規格 2. 電力電子元件特性 3. 元件與電路佈局 4. 元件特性與雜訊 5. 元件特性與損失 6. 元件的選用與電路系統
description.en: 1. Device Specification 2.Device Characteristics 3. Component And Layout 4. Circuit Noise 5. Device Loss 6. Device Selection and Circuit Implementation.

description.zh: 隨著電力網路的日趨複雜，以及智慧型電網的發展，傳統的電力保護系統漸漸無法滿足未來電力系統的需求。本課程主要目標旨在教導學生學習電腦電驛系統，並了解電力數位訊號處理之基礎，主要內容包括：1. 電腦電驛系統簡介 2. 電腦電驛的數位訊號處理 3. 離散傅葉轉換技術 4. 離散小波轉換技術 5. 遞迴式最小平方差與卡門濾波器技術 6. 微分方程技術 7. 輸電線保護電驛 8. 相量計算技術 9. 多端點輸電線保護 10. 風力發電場保護 11. 適應性電驛理論 12. 電驛與控制
description.en: 1.Introduction to computer relaying system2.Digital Signal Processing for Computer Relaying3.Numerical Analysis for Computer Relaying4.Discrete Fourier Transform techniques5.Discrete Wavelet Transform based technique.6.Recursive Least squares (RLS) and Kalman filter based techniques7.Differential equation based technique8.Transmission lines relaying9.Phasor calculation techniques10.Wind farms protection11.Principles of adaptive relay12.Relaying and Control

notes: 綜科 514, 限職電機所學生修讀。

description.zh: 電控技術在現代工業應用中扮演著不可或缺的角色。因此，本課程的目的在使學生了解電控技術，其內容包括 Matlab/Simulink 軟體平台介紹、電控系統建模、分析與設計。
description.en: Electrical control technology plays an important role in modern industrial applications. Therefore, the purpose of this course is to introduce the technology to the students. The content includes Matlab/Simulink software platform, and electrical control system modeling, analysis and design.

name.zh: 計算機在電控技術之應用
name.en: Computer Methods for Electrical Control Technology

description.zh: 研究生須要具有整合、分析資料與創新思維、寫作能力以完成碩博士論文。本課程主要包括：一、 良好研究特質，二、 研究規劃， 三、學習方法， 四、 創新思維方法 五、 寫作方法， 六、 簡報方法， 七、 研究實務練習
description.en: Graduate students need to integrate information and innovative insights to successfully achieve a master or Ph.D degree. The course includes:1. Characteristics of good researchers. 2. Research planning. 3. Learning method. 4. Innovative thinking.5. Writing method. 6. Present method.7. Research design practice

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.  This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.  This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 應用語言學屬於邊緣交叉學科，與其他學科如語言學、心理學、教育學、人類學與社會學之間存在密切的關係。本課程著重在介紹第二語言與外語習得、第二語言與外語教學法、言談分析與社會語用學及社會文化學理論的研究，並探討這些領域與語言教學與學習之間的關連。本課程涵蓋各種不同觀點的理論與應用，回顧方法論的演進歷史，尤其強調現今廣受認同的方法論。
description.en: Applied linguistics is a large interdisciplinary field of study related to a range of academic fields, including linguistics, psychology, education, anthropology, and sociology. This course focuses primarily on research in the areas of second/foreign language acquisition, second/foreign language pedagogy, discourse analysis, and sociopragmatic and sociocultural theory, as well as their relevance to language teaching and learning. We will cover theories and applications from a variety of perspectives, tracing the history of methodologies with special emphasis on those currently in widespread use.

description.zh: 中文課程概述：本課程將介紹如何使用工程軟體解決數值分析的相關問題。除此之外，本課程將培養同學在相關專業科目其工程軟體設計的技巧，並利用工程軟體所學之技巧解決各種工程問題。
description.en: How to solve the numerical analysis problem via engineering software will be introduced in this course. Students will be familiar with the programming engineering software in this course. Besides, students will learn how to utilize the software to solve the different engineering problems.

name.en: Application and design of engineering software

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 線性代數為工程類學科之基礎數學之一，著重於訓練學生矩陣運算及基本數學証明。課程大綱如下：1. 解聯立方程式 2. 矩陣運算 3. 行列式 4. 向量空間 5. 線性轉換 6. 特徵值及特徵向量 7. 選擇性題材，視時間充許教授下列之一：矩陣數值方法，Jordan form , 或線性規劃
description.en: As a basic mathematics in engineering,the course Linear Algebraemphasizes on the subjest of matrix computation(theory) and thetechnique of mathematical proving.The outline of the course includes the following:1.Systems of Linear Equations2.Matrices3.Determinants4.Vector Spaces5.Linear Transformations6.Eigenvalues and Eigenvectors7.Advanced Topics: selet one of the following if time permitted:  Numerical Techniques in Matrix operations,Jordan form,or     Linear Programming.

description.zh: 1. 各種感測器結構、特性及工作原理簡介。2. 各種感測器之測量系統及轉換界面電路設計。3. 監控系統及感測器應用設計。
description.en: 1.Introduction of sensors.2.Measurement system of sensors.3.Application and design of sensors.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。技術的關鍵特性和技術之生命週期，企業核心技術、來源和取得，技術的管理與風險，國家科技政策之影響，企業與技術生存之道，全球創新產品之開發，全球創新產品的技術策略與戰略，未來趨勢和走向。
description.en: Technological Innovation: Process, Content, and Types, Organization

description.zh: 瞭解程式語言所常用之各種資結構，１. 抽象資料類別及運算複雜度之概念，２. 靜態結構及其儲存法，３. 遞迴、堆疊、前序、中序、後序運算式，４. 佇列，５. 串列、鏈結串列，６. 樹、二元樹、平衡樹、堆積，７. 圖形，８. 排序，９. 搜尋、雜湊。
description.en: This course is mainly aimed at introducing the data  structures commonly used in programming languages, including: (1) the concept of ADT (abstract data type) and computational complexity, (2) static structures and their storage representations , (3) recursion, stacks, and prefix, infix, and posfix expressions, (4) queues, (5) lists and linked lists, (6) trees, binary trees, height balanced trees, and heaps,  (7) graphs, (8) soring, and (9) searching and hashing.

description.zh: 本課程之教學目標在使學生瞭解訊號與系統之基本概念及分析方法，以作為通訊、控制、電子電路、濾波器設計及數位信號處理等課程修習之基礎。課程內容包含：(1) 標準訊號及訊號表示法 (2) 連續系統的數學分析 (3) 離散系統的數學分析 (4) 拉氏轉換分析 (5) Z - 轉換分析 (6) 傅立葉分析 (7) 工程應用。
description.en: This course contains the properties of signals, systems, LTI systems, and basis linear transforms. This is a basic course in the field of communication and control.

description.zh: 1. 程序同步 2. 同作機制 3. 虛擬記憶體 4. 分散式系統 5. 分散式同作控制 6. 電腦安全 7. 排程模式
description.en: 1.Process synchronization2.Concurrency Mechanisms3.Virtual memory4.Distributed Systems5.Distributed Concurrency Control6.Queuing Models

description.zh: 深度學習探討如何能利用深層類神經網路，由觀測到的資料中自我學習，自我進化，而能有效進行預測，分類，偵測，辨認與決策，以建立人工智慧。本課程為進階的機器學習課程，將會花相當多的時間深入探討各種不同的訓練方法不同結構的類神經網路。包括深層類神經網路，卷積類神經網路，遞迴類神經網路等等網路架構，與監督式學習，非監督式學習，強化式學習，對抗式學習等等訓練方法。本課程並會要求學生實現各種不同類型的類神經網路，將其著應用在解決多種人本人工智慧服務設計問題。包時間序列預測，物體偵測與辨認，語音訊號處理、影像訊號處理、自然語言處理，音訊訊號處理等多種人本資訊處理。
description.en: Deep learning is a branch of artificial intelligence that focuses on how to use deep neural networks to self-learn and self-evolve from observed data, as well as to effectively predict, classify, detect patterns and make decisions.This course is an advanced machine learning course that delves into different neural network structures and training methods. Students will be asked to implement different neural networks to solve various human-centered artificial intelligent service design problems (e.g., time series prediction, object detection, image recognition, speech signal processing, video signal processing, natural language processing, audio signal processing, etc.).

name.zh: 深度學習與類神經網路

description.zh: 可穿戴式應用已成了全球科技產業的新寵兒之一。因此，漸漸地，穿戴式裝置已成為人們生活用品的一部分。本課程討論可穿戴式系統導論、無線感測網路導論、生醫資訊模組設計、可穿戴式教學平台之設計、情境感知遠距監控與定位救援手仗之設計、非視覺型之不穩步態偵測分析設計、自行車玩家生醫資訊守護神設計、遠距醫療照護系統設計、與客製化谷歌智慧型眼鏡設計。本課程主要達成跨領域的高度整合應用訓練課程。
description.en: Wearable applications have been become one new darling of the global technology industries. Hence, gradually, the wearable devices have become part of people's daily necessities. This course will discuss the topics of “Introduction of wearable system, Introduction of wireless sensor network, Design of Bio-information module, Design of wearable teaching platform, Design of Context-Aware Tele-monitor and Position-rescue Staff, Detection Analysis and Design for Unstable Gait with Non-vision Base, Bicycler-Player Bio-information Guardian, Design of Tele-Medicine care system, and Design of customized Google Smart-glass”. This course is highly integrated applications to achieve interdisciplinary training.

description.zh: 1. 各種感測器結構、特性及工作原理簡介。2. 各種感測器之測量系統及轉換界面電路設計。3. 監控系統及感測器應用設計。
description.en: 1.Introduction of sensors.2.Measurement system of sensors.3.Application and design of sensors.

notes: 訓練場代開課，上學期限 A 組選

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生如何使用硬體描述語言來分析與設計數位積體電路及系統，進而能培養學生具有設計積體電路的能力，課程內容包括： 1. 電腦輔助設計積體電路介紹 2. 硬體描述語言程式設計與模擬介紹 3. 積體電路設計軟體之介紹及使用 (Verilog) 4.FPGA ( Xilinx ) 的設計 5. 專題設計
description.en: This course is trained the student to use hardware-description language tools for the analysis and simulation of integrated circuits(digital & analysis) .Therefore, the student have the design capability of integrated circuit. The contents of this course: 1.Introduction to the Computer-aided IC design 2.System design using hardware description language 3.Introduction to the computer-aided design of digital integrated circuits (Verilog) and computer-exercise 4.FPGA(XILINX)design and computer-exercise 5.Project

name.zh: 硬體描述語言程式設計與模擬
name.en: System Design Using Hardware Description Language

notes: 訓練場代開課，上學期限 B 組選

description.zh: 有關建築歷史、理論、批評、構造、營建管理等相關主題討論。
description.en: A theme topic discussion on the field of architecture history, theory, criticism, structure, construction and management, etc.

notes: 建築四與日職建都所合開

description.zh: (1)「田口方法」介紹 (2) 完整的「田口方法」，包含以下三個主題：(a) S/N 比之理論基礎及進階應用；(b) 直交表之理論基礎及進階應用；(c) 變異分析。(3) 應用「田口方法」進行專案研究，並繳交專案主題與報告。
description.en: (1) The course gives step-by-step to explaining the "Taguchi Method" for the students.     (2) The course gives the fully "Taguchi Method" for the students during a short time, which including three topical subjects:  (a) The basic theory of S/N ratio and its advanced applications.  (b) The basic theory of Orthogonal Arrays and its advanced applications.  (c) Analysis of Variance (ANOVA)  (3) Students will use the "Taguchi Method" to proceeding a project study, and hand over their theme and report of project.

name.en: Taguchi Method on the Quality Design

description.zh: 本課程說明知識的定義、知識的分類、產業知識的產生和移轉，進而探討知識的創新，並利用知識管理提升產業生產及營運的效率，產業應用知識管理的概況和案例
description.en: This course is to explain definition of the knowledge, classification of the knowledge and generation and transfer of the knowledge. Moreover, the innovation of the knowledge will be discussed. Using knowledge management, it will improve the efficiency of the production and operation of the business. The applications and examples of the knowledge management will be included.

description.zh: 1 設計的基本概念 2 架構、資料型別與運算子 3 組合與循序邏輯 4 函式 / 程序與屬性 / 組態 5 階層式設計 6 功能與時序模擬 7 設計合成 8 狀態機設計 9 管線式處理 10. 記憶體設計 11. 特殊應用積體電路設計與實作
description.en: This course both provides the digital logical concepts and trains the student how to use the computer-aided design tools to simulate and to implement the advanced FPGA system. The contents of this course are listed as following: 1.Design concepts to logic circuits 2.Structure, data type and operator 3.Combinationa-circuit and Sequential-circuit 4.Function/process and task/attribute 5.Architectural design 6.Functional and timing simulation 7.Synthesizer 8.State machine design 9.Pipelined process 10.RAM and ROM 11.ASIC design and implementation.

name.zh: 高等 FPGA 系統設計

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 染顏料 (色料) 雖已發展百餘年，唯部分現象與實驗結果仍須進一步的研究以獲得完整正確的解釋。本課程主要探討染料的吸收光譜與其分子結構式的關係，是為具有色料化學與有機化學基礎的同學所設計的。
description.en: Although studies on synthetic colourants have been performed for more than 100 years, their detailed elucidation requires further extensive research.This course reviews the absorption features of organic dyes and recent progress in their explanation in terms of molecular structure. This course is mainly intended for organic chemists and colour chemists which are interested in the spectral characteristics of dyes and their conceptual understanding.

description.zh: 本課程旨在對非工程類科出身之研究生，做有系統基礎材料科學之建立。課程包括 (1) 原子鍵結與配位 (2) 晶體 [原子規律性](3) 固相中之不規律性 (4) 相平衡 (5) 材料微結構 (6) 反應速率 (7) 材料破壞學 (8) 導電材與半導材料 (9) 陶瓷材料 (10) 聚合物及複合材料
description.en: This course is aimed at systematically introducing some important concepts of material engineering for students who were not an engineer training in their BS. The course covers (1)Atomic Bonding and Coordination (2)Crystal Structure (3)Disorder in Solid Phase (4)Phase Equilibria (5)Microstructures (6)Reaction Rate (7)Deformation and Fracture (8)Conducting and Semi-conducting Materials (9)Ceramic Materials (10)Polymer and Composites.

description.zh: 1. 印刷電路板介紹 2. 線路圖繪製 3.PCB 佈局基本觀念介紹 4. 印刷電路板設計工具介紹 5. 高速數位 PCB 佈線設計的流程與基本原理 6. 阻抗特性、反射現象、串音現象的介紹 7. 高速數位 PCB 的量測技術介紹 8. 案例說明
description.en: 1.Introduction to PCB. 2. Introduction to Schematics Circuits 3. Introduction to concepts of PCB layout 4. Introduction to PCB Design tools 5.Flow and Fundamentals of High-Speed Digital PCB Layout Design 6. Introduction to Impedance Characteristics, Reflections, and Crosstalk 7. Measurement Technology of High-Speed Digital PCB 8. Case Study

name.zh: 高速數位 PCB 設計導論
name.en: Introduction to High-Speed Digital PCB Design

notes: 訓練場代開課，上學期限 B 組選

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study.Seminar.Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程將結合理論說明與示範實習，使同學對雷射基本原理及光電科技應用有一完整的認識，內容包括：1. 光電工程概論，2. 基礎光學，3. 電射發光原理，4. 雷射光的調製，5. 光電科技應用概論。
description.en: The course covers bath lectures and lab exercise1.Introduction 2.Fundamentals of optics3.Laser principles4.Electrooptic modulation of laser beams5.Applications of electrooptic techniques

description.zh: 瞭解微算機之基本組織架構及應用，內容包含：1.PC 之使用，2. 微電腦學習機之使用，3. 邏輯分析儀之使用，4. 組合語言之設計與除錯，5. 記憶體設計 ROM/RAM，6. 輸出入埠設計及程式控制，7. 輸出入埠應用 (鍵盤介面、LED 顯示介面)，8.A/D、D/A 介面設計，9. 簡單 PC 介面卡設計 (PIO 及 SIO) 介面，單晶片之設計與應用。
description.en: The experiment covers the basic architecture and application of microcomputer.The lab. work includes:1.The usage of PC2.The usage of microcomputer training machine3.Logic analysis4.The design and debug of assembly language5.ROM/RAM design6.I/O design and control 7.A/D, D/A design8.PC interfacing design9.Single-chip microcomputer system design

name.zh: 微算機原理及應用實習

notes: 訓練場代開課，上學期限 B 組選

description.zh: 瞭解電路元件之基本特性及其組合電路之分析方法，內容包含：1. 電路元件：電壓及電流源，主動元件，2. 電路特性：歐姆定律，柯希荷夫電壓與電流定律等，3. 一階及二階電路：電路之微分方程描述及各種輸入信號之響應，4. 穩態分析與頻率響應：分析電路之頻域，5. 電腦輔助電路分析：如使用 SPICE 工具。
description.en: 1.Introduction to linear circuit analysis2.Resistve circuit 3.Kirchhoff laws4.Thevenin and Norton theorem5.First and second order circuit6.Node and loop analysis7.Steady state response and analysis8.SPICE tool

notes: 訓練場代開課，上學期限 A 組選

description.zh: (1) 半導體二極體特性曲線；(2) 半導體二極體之應用：整流器，濾波器，剪波器，箝位器，倍壓器；(3) 發光二極體驅動電路；(4) 齊納二極體穩壓電路；(5) 雙極接合面電晶體之辨別與參數量測；(6) 雙極接合面電晶體輸入及輸出特性曲線；(7) 雙極接合面電晶體直流偏壓電路；(8) 共射極放大電路；(9) 射極隨耦電路；(10) 共基極定電流源電路；(11) 場效電晶體之辨別與參數量測；(12) 場效電晶體轉移及輸出特性曲線；(13) 場效電晶體直流偏壓電路；(14) 場效電晶體放大電路；(15) 整流及濾波電路；(16) 偏壓分析與設計；(17) 基本放大器 (共射，共基，共集模式，共源，共汲，共閘等); (18) 串級放大器；(19) 差動放大器。
description.en: (1)The characteristic curve of PN diode; (2)The applications of PN diode : Rectifier, Filter, Clipper, Clamper, and Voltage-doubler; (3)Light Emitting Diode drivers; (4)Zener diode for voltage regulation; (5)The identification of BJT's leads and the measurement of b parameter; (6)The input and output characteristic curves of BJTs; (7)DC biasing circuits for BJTs; (8)Common-Emitter(CE) amplifiers; (9)Emitter-follower(EF) circuits; (10)Common-Base(CB) constant current sources; (11)The identification of FET's leads and the measurement of device parameters; (12)The transfer and output characteristic curves of FETs; (13)DC biasing circuits for FETs; (14)The amplifying circuits of FETs; (15)Retifier circuit and Filter; (16)Bias analysis and design; (17)Common Emitter amplifier, Common base amplifier, Common collector amplifier; (18)Differential amplifier.

notes: 訓練場代開課，上學期限 A 組選

description.zh: 本課程內容包括邏輯閘的特性與功能測試，能利用積體電路完成各種基礎邏輯電路的組裝及設計，並能利用電子儀器進行量測、檢修。探討最佳化組合邏輯之演算法，可規劃邏輯元件，組合邏輯之 VLSI 設計，使用 MSI 與標準電路元件設計多層邏輯，使用閘陣列設計，循序邏輯之元件，循序邏輯之分析與合成，VLSI 之設計與測試技巧，各種 CAD 軟體工具介紹。基礎邏輯閘實驗、組合邏輯實驗、加法器及減法器實驗、組合邏輯應用實驗、正反器邏輯實驗、循序邏輯電路應用實驗。
description.en: 1.Properties and function tests of logic gates. 2. Implementations of and designs of basic logic circuits using ICs. 3.Algorithms for the optimization of combinational logic circuits. 4.Programmable logic devices. 5.VLSI design of combinational logic circuits. 6.Multi-layer logic circuits using MSI and standard circuit  elements. 7.Gate array design. 8.Sequential Logic components. 9.Analysis and synthesis of sequential Logic circuits. 10. Technologies of VLSI design and test. 11. CAD software tools. 12.Basic logic gate experiments. 13.Combinational logic experiments. 14. Adder and subtractor experiments. 15. Combinational logic application experiments. 16. Flip-flop experiments. 17. Sequential circuit application experiments.

notes: 訓練場代開課，上學期限 B 組選

description.zh: 使學生熟悉，應用程式設計之環境、方法、及原則，內容含：（１）作業系統與應用程式之關係（２）視窗環境（３）網路環境（４）整合設計學生將窗撰寫完整之應用程式
description.en: To familiarize the student with the environments,methodologies,and principles of application softwaredesign.Topics include :1.Run-time environments2.Window environments3.Networking environments4.Integrated designThe student will write application programs with actual function.

notes: 訓練場代開課，上學期限 A 組選

description.zh: 1. 數位通訊系統簡介 2. 隨機程序 3. 數位調變與多工技術 4. 最佳接收器 5. 載波與符碼同步 6. 消息理論 7. 訊源編碼 8. 通道編碼 9. 展頻通訊系統 10. 行動通訊系統
description.en: 1. Introduction 2. Random Processes3. Digital Modulation and Multiplexing4. Optimal Receiver5. Carrier and Symbol Synchronization6. Information Theory7. Source Coding 8. Channel Coding9. Spread Spectrum Systems10. Mobile Communication Systems

description.zh: 本課程旨在提升管理決策之心智、理論與技能，並在複雜企業環境下的實務管理決策案例分析應用，使了解在國際環境中科技進展及應用下，如何透過各種決策模式了解並分析複雜情境，達成經濟及有效的管理決策。另一方面，透過了解、認同領導統御的理念、特質及行為，建立學生全面性的傑出領導素養。
description.en: This course covers theoretical knowledge and practical skills providing the ability to develop managerial decisions based on the application of various methods in the international environment, including: studying and analyzing the process of making economic and managerial decisions. In the same time, this course is designed to provide a basic introduction to leadership by focusing on what it means to be a good leader. Emphasis in the course is on the practice of potential philosophy of leadership, traits, skills, behaviors, and develop students a great overall leadership proficiency.

description.zh: 各式數位科技已被廣泛應用在各產業，本課程主要是介紹數位轉型、智慧製造與永續生產相關之課題及其相關技術。
description.en: Many digital technologies have been widely used in various industries. This course mainly introduces topics related to digital transformation, smart manufacturing and sustainable production, as well as related technologies.

notes: 工管四甲乙合開，6/18 停開【停開】

description.zh: 隨著網際網路的盛行，電子商務迅速地蓬勃發展，使得傳統的商店與行銷環境受到衝擊。資訊科技改變了消費習慣與行銷通路，電子商務的效應已經開始影響商業活動的每個層面，從新產品的開發、銷售、到售後服務均受影響，為企業帶來了無限商機。根據資策會的報告顯示，網際購物市場目前正進入高成長期。網際網路的消費觀念逐漸普及，消費者端的網路交易市集，亦成為未來重要的網路商機。不僅 B2C 市場（企業對消費者）極具潛力，網友個體戶的開店創業風潮（C2C）更是在蓬勃發中。面對網路商業的來臨，有著大量的網路商業的人才需求。只要有正確的網路商業經營獲利模式，網路是一個可以賺到大錢的管道，尤其低門檻、低成本的網路拍賣場更是最佳踏板。本課程講授網路創業及網路商業的必要實務經營能力，讓同學在本課程裡學得如何快速的以最少成本來 DIY 速成個人事業及就業的能力。
description.en: Following the prevailing of the internet, the vigorous development e-commerce has given great impacts on traditional tangible stores and the whole marketing environments. Information Technology has not only changed our lives, but also changed consumers' behavior and marketing channels; and the e-commerce effect has already started to permeate into every stratum of business activities, including the exploitation, marketing, and after-sales service of new products, brings the industries infinite business chances. According to the reports of Institute for Information Industry, the market of internet shopping is going into its high development period, and there are a lot of chances to establish a new enterprise on the internet. So this course will teach about the internet entrepreneurial management.

description.zh: 本課程的主要目的在學習智慧營運管理的基本觀念與應用。課程內容包括：(1) 智慧營運管理基本概念、(2) 大數據分析與營運管理、(3) 人工智慧與營運管理、(4) 物聯網與營運管理、(5) 智慧製造與營運管理、(6) 智慧物流管理、(7) 智慧供應鏈管理、(8) 智慧生產規劃與排程、(9) 永續營運管理。
description.en: This course will introduce basic concept and application of advanced operation management. The topics addressed in this course include: (1) Basic concept and application of intelligent operations management, (2) Big data analytic and operations management, (3) Artificial intelligence and operations management, (4) IoT and operations management, (5) Smart manufacturing and operations management, (6) Intelligent logistic management, (7) Intelligent supply chain management, (8) Intelligent production planning and scheduling, (9)Sustainable operations management.

description.zh: 當企業在邁向資訊化與自動化的同時，智慧生產工程師需考量如何整合智慧製造與精實生產。本課程的目標在幫助學生瞭解智慧製造在工廠上的應用，學習建構所謂精實導向的企業。
description.en: Since business are moving toward information and automation, smart production engineers need to consider how to integrate smart manufacturing and lean production. The goal of this course is to help students understand the application of smart manufacturing in the factory and to learn to build a so-called lean-oriented enterprise.

description.zh: 本課程適用於一般大專之決策分析課程。其目的在說明決策理論之基本觀念，及其在真實世界裡相關決策問題之分析。本課程授課主題包括：不考慮機率之決策問題、與機率有關之決策問題、獲取額外資訊之決策分析、效益分析、遊戲理論。相關之授課內容包括：機率分配、期望值方法、貝氏分析、完全資訊與額外資訊之期望值。
description.en: This is an undergraduate course dealing with decison making and analysis.The objective of this course is to interpret the basic concepts of decision theory and its applications on some real world decision analysis problims.The main topics of this course include decision making without probability,decision making with probability,decison analysis with additional information,utility theory,gametheory.The related studies includes prlbability distribution,expected value approach,Bayesian analysis,expected value of perfect informatin and sample information.

description.zh: 本課程旨在為學生提供創業和經營新創企業所需的基本知識和技能。 課程內容涵蓋當前各種形態的創業模式和創業家精神所具備的一些關鍵特質與必要的技能，學生將學習到如何識別市場機會並評估將想法商業化的可行性。本課程也將深入介紹行銷的核心概念與市場運作，包括市場細分，目標顧客定位和行銷組合，學生將學習到如何根據市場需求制定行銷策略並有效地實施。該課程還將涵蓋品牌策略、定價策略、推廣和銷售等主題。完成本課程後，學生將獲得關於創業以及經營企業的關鍵知識和技能，以及對行銷在創業過程中的作用有更深入的理解。
description.en: This course aims to provide students with the foundational knowledge and skills necessary to start and operate a new business venture. Students will learn about the various forms of entrepreneurship and entrepreneurship essentials, such as the characteristics, traits, and skills of successful entrepreneurs. Students will learn how to identify opportunities and assess the feasibility of a business idea. The course will then delve into the core concepts of marketing, including market segmentation, targeting, positioning, and the marketing mix. Students will learn how to develop a marketing plan and implement it effectively. The course will also cover topics such as branding, pricing strategies, promotion, and distribution. Upon completion of this course, students will have gained the knowledge and skills necessary to launch and operate a new business, as well as a deeper understanding of the role of marketing in entrepreneurship.

description.zh: 本課程針對幼稚園、國小、與國中階段的英語師資而設計，在教材與教法的搭配上提供學理的引介與實務上的訓練。本課程設計考量這些階段學生之身心發展程度與興趣，將屬於兒童與青少年文學範疇的文本（例如：希臘神話、哈利波特系列、波西傑克森系列等等）作創意運用，幫助老師們擷取並改編合宜的教材，經由活潑的教學活動（包括：改編戲劇演出、繪本製作、歌唱舞蹈等等），提高學生的英語能力，也在培養他們體察文化差異的深層素養。
description.en: Designed for kindergarten, elementary school, and junior high school English teacher, this course aims to provide practical training and theories in teaching materials and pedagogy. Students of this course will also learn to adapt children and teenager literary works such as Greek mythology, the Harry Potter series, and the Posey Jackson series into materials suitable for students at the above-specified age groups. Possible learning activities such as role-play, picture books, dancing/singing will also be explored as methods to both develop students' English proficiency and cultural awareness.

name.zh: 兒童文學融入英語教學
name.en: Children's Literature and English Language Teaching

description.zh: 本課程以越南語教學為主，培養學生的聽、說、讀、寫能力，以達到溝通的目的，增進學生對越南文化的認識與興趣，提供學生越南語的基礎知識，越南經貿、觀光文化及越語字母拼音教學，讓學生在學習越語的同時，深入了解越南文化，協助學生拓展東南亞的就業版圖。
description.en: This course will help students have basic communication skill, basic knowledge of Vietnamese (including alphabet, phonetic and grammar) and better understanding Vietnam culture.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹專利檢索及專利地圖的觀念，課程包含以下兩部分：一、為什麼需要進行專利檢索以及如何有效率地找到相關前案，二、如何建構專利地圖及相關資訊的應用。
description.en: The concepts of patent search and patent map will be introduced in this course. The topics of the course includes: 1. Why it is important to do patent search. 2. How to find a related prior art efficiently, 3. How to construct a patent map and exploit related information.

description.zh: 本課程將探討 (1) 智財商業模式與智財交易 (2) 英美契約法 (3) 智財授權契約規範 (4) 授權程序與稽核 (5) 技術合作契約 (6) 智財合資契約及章程
description.en: This course will illustrate the following issues: (1) IP Business Model and IP Transactions, (2) Anglo-American Contract Law,  (3) Definition,  Regulation, Types & Management of IP License,  (4)License Agreement Auditing for Licensing Business, (5)  Technical Cooperation Contract, (6) IP Joint Venture Contract and Articles of Association.

name.zh: 國際智權契約與技術移轉

notes: 先鋒 1401 教室，日職合開

description.zh: 專利攻防已變成產業策略之一，越來越多的訴訟案件逼使廠商進行專利迴避設計。事實上台灣的產業界對於迴避設計、專利策略與專利佈局理論上並不陌生，但在實務上卻很少實際執行，所以每年仍然付出五十億美金的權利金。本課程將從專利範圍解讀開始，熟悉專利的權利範圍，然後介紹專利策略以及佈局的方向，提供專利佈局與專利策略理論及實務經驗。本課程的綱要如下： 1. 專利權利項解讀 2. 專利侵權分析流程 3. 專利迴避設計要件 4. 專利策略分析 5. 專利佈局實務 6. 案例研究
description.en: Patent litigation, either initiation or defense, has become one of the industrial strategies, and more and more patent suit cases have forced the manufacturers to undertake patent design around. In fact, the industrial fields in Taiwan, theoretically, do not feel strange on design around and patent strategies. However, in practice, they perform much less. That is the reason why Taiwan still has to pay more than five billion US dollars each year for royalty. This course will start from patent claim interpretation, getting patent claims well known, then following with introduction on orientation of patent strategies, and providing theory and practice on patent strategies. The outline of this course is given as follows: Patent claim interpretation; Process of patent infringement analysis; Requirements of patent design around; Patent strategy analysis; Practice on patent strategies; and Study on patent cases.

name.zh: 專利佈局與專利策略專題研究
name.en: Seminar on Patent Portfolio and Patent Strategy

description.zh: 以案例解析為主的方式，探究我國著作權法的重要課題，藉以協助同學了解審判實務適用法律的依據、判準或論證等，並適時補充國外相關學理、判決及著名案例等，以增進同學對國內外相關重要著作權案例之思辨及評析的能力。
description.en: This is a course focused on case analyses, in studying important issues relating to Taiwanese Copyright Act. Graduate students joining this course may find help on comprehension of the basis, rules or argumentation to the laws applied in trial practice.  Together with timely supplementation of relevant foreign academic interpretations, adjudications and noted cases, students may improve their ability of contemplation and analysis on related and significant copyright cases home and abroad.

description.zh: 講授並整合高齡者產品設計之基本理論、設計方法。分析並研討高齡者因身心機能退化所面臨的處境，包括居家、行動及使用產品時可能面對的困難。訓練學生以工業設計的理論、方法與分析，深入瞭解高齡族群對設計之需求，進而達成產品創新之決策。
description.en: Lecture on theory and design practice of senile product design. To study age-related changes in health and physical functioning which affect older people's access to facilities and use of products that they need in every day life. Practice of exploring older adults' experience and needs in using products and their attitude toward product design improvement.

description.zh: 本課程旨在以個別與小組合作模式，訓練學生通曉設計開發流程，以執行設計專案。藉由實務案例的運作，及兼顧產業與組織之需求，以體現產業與社會文化面的問題與解決對策。本課程又以培育學生具備專業設計師之設計企劃提案與概念發想能力，以及學生使用設計工具之能力。
description.en: The goal of Advanced Product Design (II) is to train, under supervision, students in strategic areas of the product development process. In these projects, the students work alone or in groups. The projects are usually based on problems defined within different branches of industry and social sectors. Project work is usually done under realistic conditions, in collaboration with different industrial companies or public institutions. Students can contribute to this reality by developing sensible and usable products and systems which include qualities that speak to the heart and mind of people. We educate students as designers to have an open mind on both conceptual ideas and detailed realistic design solutions in order to develop higher quality products. Another important focus area of this course is to improve the students' capabilities in the use of modern design tools.

description.zh: 本課程介紹資料分析與圖示的工具與方法，包括如何以精確的模式來描述資料、利用各種指標與圖形來探索給定資料的特性、特徵、或是規律性，並且可以根據所建立的資料模型來進行估計與預測。此外，我們也將探討如何產生各種機率分布的隨機樣本，以及各種最佳化問題求解。本課程將以 R 程式語言為工具。
description.en: This course introduces tools and methods for data analysis and graphics. The main topics include models that are used to describe data, indices and plots for exploring data characteristics and patterns, and estimation and prediction based on the data models. In addition, we discuss how to generate random sample from probability distributions and how to solve optimization problems. The selected tool for this course is R.

description.zh: 計算機系統之基礎觀念介紹及應用。主要內容包括：1. 計算機系統簡介 2 . 資料的表示法、數字系統、邏輯 3. 周邊裝置及儲存體 4. 程式語言與程式設計 5. 作業系統 6. 檔案與資料庫
description.en: This introductory course covers the fundamentals and applications of computers,including, 1.introduction to computer systems, 2.data representation, number systems,and logic 3.peripherals and storage, 4.programming languages and programming 5.operating systems 6..Files and database system

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意力系的平衡，摩擦，面積與質量慣性矩，結構分析，虛功法。
description.en: Equivalent Systems of Forces, Equilibrium, Aera and Mass, Momemts of Inertia, Analysis of Structures of Virtual Work.

description.zh: 依據提供服務準則，工程師們須以誠實公平公正正當和奉獻保護公共健康，安全及幸福。工程師們必須以專業標準的行為履行最高的倫理準則。本課程以（1）工程倫理概述（2）衝突與抉擇（3）守則與解說（4）個案分析，提供學生瞭解及研析。
description.en: Accordingly, the services provided by engineers require honesty, impartiality, fairness, and equity and must be dedicated to protection of the public health, safety and welfare. Engineers must perform under a standard of professional behavior that require adherence to the highest principles of ethical conduct. This course offers (1).Description of engineering ethics (2).Conflict and selection (3).Rule and explanation (4).Case study for student studied.

description.zh: 日常生活中，科技和化學伴隨著人類的成長，除了吃、喝、玩樂外，[用] 也是很重要的一部份，例如我們時時刻刻在用的洗面乳、洗髮乳、沐浴乳、洗碗精、洗衣精等等的民生用品。探討這些化學對於環境的影響，並透過簡易的化學實驗來了解到民生化學用品與環境的關聯。了解日常生活中拋棄的廢棄物，如何轉換成有效的資源，達到綠色循環的經濟概念。
description.en: In our daily lives, science and chemistry develop and progress along with people.  However, life is not just about eating, drinking, playing, and entertainment.  "Usage" is also very important, specifically when it comes to the facial cleansers, body washes, dish and laundry detergents, and other cleaning supplies that we use.  From simple tests to determine the effects of chemicals on the environment, we understand how discarded daily articles can be transformed into effective resources, thus putting into practice a green recycling economy.

description.zh: 環境保護是廿世紀的新課題，也是人類目前及未來所面臨的最大考驗。因為環境問題是超越國界的，因此環境的保護是每個人都必須瞭解的，也是每個人應盡的責任。本課程首先在了解環境與生活素質的關係，並了解環境問題的產生及其分類，再就台灣環境問題之所在分析其根源，最後了解台灣環境實施之現況後，並共同研究解決之道。
description.en: Introduction to Environmental Protection is a brand new issue of the 20th century; also, it is the biggest challenge of all human beings and our offspring. Because environmental protection is an international issue, everyone got to realize it's importance and take some action. This lesson is designed to help students understand: 1. the connection between our environment and our living condition; 2.the cause of environmental problems and their classification; 3.the cause of environmental problems in Taiwan; and 4.the solution to Taiwan's environmental problems.

description.zh: 本課程的重點在於闡述管理學之基本概念，主要的內容涵蓋四個領域：(1) 瞭解管理學之理論與相關學者之研究報告；(2) 討論企業界管理應用實務案例；(3) 探討多國化管理之趨勢與差異 (4) 如何落實管理理論研討與趨勢。另外介紹現代管理相關功能實務應用案例。
description.en: The purpose of Management has four distinct objectives：(1)to introduce a new management paradigm；(2)to effectively combine the basic concepts of management and organizational behavior into a single volume, including the management functional and departmental descriptions；(3)to discuss business management applications in practice and ；(4)to effectively implement the management basic ideas. The planning, organization, decision, leadership and monitoring among variety culture will be covered and discussed in the class as well.

description.zh: 「物聯網（智慧聯網）」被視為繼個人電腦、網際網路之後，世界資訊產業的第三波浪潮。隨著科技的進步，網路早已成為人與人重要的溝通管道之一，而在未來的世界，透過物聯網技術，將賦予物件智慧並擁有與其它物件或人溝通的能力，換言之，未來網路不再只是人與人的溝通管道，更是聯繫全球物與物、人與物的橋樑。未來智慧型裝置有望相互連結、分享資料，進而改變人們的日常生活與企業的運作模式。
description.en: The Internet of Things ( IoT ) is regarded as the third wave after the invention of personal computer and the Internet.Through technological progress, the Internet has become an important way for people to communicate. In the future, the IoT technologies will enable objects to communicate with other objects, or human beings.In other words, the Internet will not only become a bridge between human beings, but also between objects, or even between human beings and objects.Future smart devices will be connected and shared across each other, changing how human beings live on a daily basis, and how enterprises operate.

name.en: Applications of Internet of Things ( IoT )

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生成為具有深度文化視覺的科技人。從認識本土文化為起點，進而認識世界文化。引導學生如何探究文化現象，並且深入文化的精神境界，物質境界，瞭解文化價值與文化傳統，讓文化觀點充分融入個人的思維內涵。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to develop the cultural cultivation of our technology majored students. Starting with the culture of our own land and extending to world-wide culture. The teachers would guide the students to explore the phenomena of the culture, and try to find out both the spirit and the material of the culture. Through the understanding of the worth and the tradition of the culture, the students might merge the cultural cultivation into their personal thinking.

description.zh: 人際關係是探討對自我的了解及對人的認知，包括性格、態度、魅力、溝通、壓力、挫折和情緒等重要課題的處理；幫助同學學習與各種不同品味、信念、立場與生活方式的人作有效率的溝通，開放的表達出自己的感覺與想法，以建立良好的合作關係，從而開發潛能、爭取更好的發展機會。
description.en: Interpersonal Relationship is to discuss about self-understanding and perception of other people, including how to handle key issues related to character, attitude, attractiveness, communication, pressure, frustration and emotion.  It helps students to learn effective communication, open their minds to express personal feeling and thought, and try to communicate with other people having different tastes, convictions, standpoints and ways of living so as to establish a harmonic and cooperative relationship and furtherly to develop personal potential and strive for better opportunity of development.

description.zh: 數學是一種語言，藉著數學語言能與人溝通。數學是科學之母，在各領域被廣泛應用，它與我們的生活息息相關，它是抽象也是具體的。 如何讓數學與現實生活相結合，本課程將瞭解數學的起源與發展過程，進而體認數學對人類文明的提昇、生活品質的改善所作的貢獻。希望能提高同學學習的興趣，活用數學，使數學藝術化、生活化。
description.en: Mathematics is a special kind of language, through which people can communicate well with each other. Mathematics is the mother of science, and thus is widely applied in many fields of science. Mathematics-abstract as well as concrete--is closely related with our life.  How can we merge mathematics into our daily life? We will try to understand the origin and development of mathematics, the way how mathematics helps to advance human civilization as well as how mathematics contributes to the better world. This course will interest the students, teach them how to make full use this kind of science and finally make mathematics more artistic and more useful in life.

description.zh: 病毒可說是介於無生命和有生命之間的物質。它小至用光學顯微鏡看不見除非在電子顯微鏡下。儘管看不見卻無所不在，與人類關係異常密切。人類基因體約 8% 是從病毒來的。目前最難解決的傳染病問題也是由病毒引起。病毒結構看來似乎很簡單，但為了生存也進化出非凡的策略。人類從研究病毒得到非常多重要的知識和研究工具。讓我們能夠對分子、細胞和生物體的結構和功能得到更深地了解，進而對疾病問題得到解決。本課程將以深入簡出的方式讓同學認識病毒：從病毒的起源，病毒如何進入宿主細胞與複製，並在宿主群體間存活和傳播所必須具備的機制。通過一系列較具代表性的人類病毒為例子進行介紹病毒複製的基礎、人類與病毒的相互作用以及如何導致疾病。同時認識人體 4006 的疫系統如何對抗病毒。了解為什麼新興病毒的出現並造成疫情。人類應如何應對。最後介紹兩種不尋常的傳染因子 - 類病毒和狂牛病蛋白。它們與病毒似乎都是在生命起源中在化學演化時期殘留下來的分子。
description.en: This course will emphasize the mechanisms necessary for the virus to successfully enter and reproduce in the host cell, and survive and spread in the host population. Through a series of representative examples of human viruses, I will introduce the general basis of virus replication, the interaction between the virus and the host, and how these factors cause diseases and our immune system against virus. Finally, I will briefly introduce two unusual infectious agents- viroid and prion.

name.en: An introduction to virology and unusual infectious agents

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹生活中需具備的財務常識，希望能培養同學良好的存錢觀念與正確的理財觀，以協助同學增加被動收入、存出第一桶金。
description.en: This course aims to introduce necessary financial knowledge for daily life. Hoping to stimulate students to save money properly and form accurate financial concepts to achieve their first pot of gold.

description.zh: 新經濟與舊經濟的分野不是在有『e』還是沒有『e』，而是在有『i』還是沒有『i』，而『i』就是『Innovation，創新』。二十一世紀的『腦力經濟』最重要的戲規則就是『智慧財產權』，同時也是 WTO 會員國必須遵守的重要規範之一。課程內容主要包括三個最基本的智慧財產權課題：專利權，商標權，以及著作權；而為配合本校學生學科背景，本課程將較著重於『專利』方面的實務知識，並且講授『如何激發創意，以培養學生日後能好好應用『智慧財產權』的保護。
description.en: The difference between New-economy and Old-economy is not caused by having "e" or not having "e", but caused by owining "i" or not owning "i". where "I" means "Innovation:.  Intellectual Property is not only the most importance business rule of the :Brain economy era:, but also one of the most important agreements among WTO members.  This course includes the basic three subjects of Intellectual Property:Patent, Trademark, and Copyright.  In order to accommodate the learning background for most of NTUT students, the contents of this course will focus more on the practical practice of the Patennt.  In addition, it also includes the subject of "how to activate your creativeness:so as to make students can use what they learn, "Intellectual Property:, to protect their intellectual work.

description.zh: 實驗是進行科學與工程研究不可或缺的工具，實驗方法的設計與實驗數據的分析更是決定實驗結果品質優劣的關鍵，本課程將介紹實驗過程所必須具備的各項知識，以數據的量測與分析為開始，並介紹量測各類物理量的感測元件，如壓力、溫度、流量及聲波等，以建立學生具備實驗量測的基礎。課程主要內容包含有基本量測、量測標準、量測單位、訊號讀取、資料簡報、數據的準確性與變異性、類比訊號量測、數位訊號量測、系統響應、感測器。
description.en: Introduction of Experiment and Measurement MethodExperiment is the essential tool for the research of science and engineering. The design of experiment and the analysis of data are the keys of the high quality of experiment. The course will introduce the materials of experiment and measurement. The procedures of measurement and the analysis method of data will be detailed investigated. And then the sensors to measure the interested physical parameters of pressure, temperature, flow rate and acoustic will be introduced. The technology of measurement and analysis of experiment will be built up in the course. The contents of the course are basic measurement, standards of measurement, dimension of measurement, access data, data presentation, accuracy and uncertainty of data, analog signal measurement, digital signal measurement, system response, and sensors.

description.zh: 本課程包含下列課題 1. 空氣清淨機構理論。2. 無塵室構造、建造及確效。3. 空氣過濾理論。4. 無塵室設計專案。5.	論文研讀。
description.en: This course covers the following Topics.1.Theory of air cleaning Mechanism.2.Clean room configuration, construction and         verification.3.Air filtration theory.4.Paper discussion.

description.zh: 系統功能分析，空調系統設計概要，負荷計算理論，送風與風管系統分析，送水系統分析，冷卻水塔熱質傳分析，主機系統性能分析
description.en: System function analysis, introduction to system designs of air-conditioning, theories on cooling load calculation, air moving and duct system analysis, water system analysis, heat and mass transfer in cooling towers, performance analysis of chillers

description.zh: 室內氣候、室外氣候、熱環境、空氣環境－汙染物、換新與通風、音環境、人體舒適度、室內空氣品質控制、潔淨室之規劃設計。
description.en: Indoor and outside air conditions, thermal environment, air pollutants, fresh air and ventilation, noise level, human confort, indoor air quality control, design of clean room.

description.zh: 近年來，網路社群迅速發展，電子商務經營已經是每個企業必要的市場競爭與顧客經營中，不可或缺的重要工具。因此，本課程中將以如何設計及管理其中的多媒體內容為課程主要內容。
description.en: The content of this course will teach  how to design the multimedia in the e-commerce.

description.zh: 自由度、(平面與空間) 運動幾何分析、彈簧、避震器、力傳遞分析、撓性、電腦輔助懸吊系統分析與設計。
description.en: Degree of Freedom, (2D and 3D) Kinematic Analysis, Springs, Dampers, Force Analysis, Compliance, Computer Aided Analysis and Design of Suspension Systems.

description.zh: 銲接冶金課程深入研究金屬銲接技術與冶金過程，培養學生在材料處理和銲接技術方面的專業能力。課程包括銲接方法、銲材選擇、熱影響、金屬結構與性能及銲接缺陷等內容，並結合實際案例，使學生能理解並應用於工程實務。
description.en: The welding metallurgy course in the graduate program delves into metal welding techniques and metallurgical processes, cultivating students' expertise in material handling and welding technologies. The curriculum covers welding methods, selection of welding materials, heat-affected zones, metal structures and properties, welding defects, and incorporates real-world cases to enable students to comprehend and apply them in engineering practice.

description.zh: 在科技發展快速的年代，有些人認為產業和市場需要更多新的法律規範，也有些人認為舊有法律需要鬆綁。但無庸置疑地，法律在科技、產業與市場的發展中，扮演著一個攸關重要的角色。基於此，本課程嘗試以設計案例討論，鼓勵不同背景的學生，經由案例分析得到綜合性的知識、從中了解科技發展如何影響法律變遷，並進而學習專業的法律策略。
description.en: In an age of rapid technology advancement, some people might insist more laws are necessary to regulate the industry and the market, on the contrary, others might think de-regulation is the best approach to encourage the free flow of the market. Nonetheless, it is beyond question that law and regulations play an vital role in the technology-driven economy today. Therefore this course is designed to help students from various backgrounds to engage in the group discussions on assigned cases. Students are expected to learn how the technology development shapes the legal environment and learn how to analyze the legal strategies.

name.zh: 科技發展與法律策略：案例研析二
name.en: Technology Development and Legal Strategy: Case Study(II)

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 冷凍空調概論、基礎知識與定義、空氣熱力學、基本冷凍循環與應用分析、壓縮理論及壓縮機性能分析、冷凍空調系統組成 - 壓縮機、冷凝器、冷媒控制器、蒸發器、冷凍介質－冷媒、二次冷媒吸收劑及冷凍油、冷媒管路及配件、空調處理過程及空調維護分析。
description.en: Refrigeration & air conditioning Introduction Fundamentals & definitions Psychrometrics Basic refrigeration cycles & application analysis Compression cycle theory & performance of compressors Compression system compositions- compressor, condenser, refrigerant controls Cooling mediums- refrigerants, secondary refrigerants, absorbents, refrigeration oils. Refrigerant piping & accessories. Air conditioning processes & cycles analysis.

notes: 限學號雙數號學生選課

description.zh: 內容包括熱力學第二定律、熵產生率、各種動力循環以及冷凍循環。
description.en: The second law of thermodynamics, Entropy generation, power cycles, refrigeration cycles and heat pump cycles.

notes: 雙號 - 暑假 6/29~8/24 開課 每週六上課六小時，六教 725

description.zh: 本課程主要係介紹資料壓縮的原理以及當前幾項重要的壓縮標準。本課程內容將涵蓋以下主題 01. 霍夫曼編碼 02. 算數編碼 03. 純量量化與向量量化 04. 線性預測與預測編碼法（DPCM，ADPCM，JPEG-LS）05. 轉換編碼（KLT，DFT，DCT，DST 以及 Walsh-Hadamard 轉換）06. 分頻編碼法（G.722 Speech coding，MPEG audio coding）07. 小波編碼法（SPIHT，JPEG2000）08. 字典模式編碼法 09. 跑長編碼法 10. 主題探討
description.en: This course is mainly focused on the principles of data compression techniques as well as the state-of-the-art compression standards. The course content includes01. Huffman codes02. Arithmetic codes03. Scalar quantization and Vector quantization04. Linear prediction and Predictive coding（DPCM，ADPCM，JPEG-LS）05. Transform coding（KLT, DFT, DCT, DST, and WHT）06. Subband coding（G.722 Speech coding，MPEG audio coding）07. Wavelet-Based Compression（SPIHT, JPEG2000）08. Dictionary techniques09. Runlength coding10. Selected topics

description.zh: 科技日文主要是以培養閱讀日文科技期刊或論文能力為重點，俾充實大學理工系、所學生參考日文系列技術論文或工程手冊時之理解、翻譯與書寫方式。課程內容包含：    1. 論文閱讀練習    2. 翻訣技巧    3. 技術論文之書寫
description.en: This course will direct students to learn the ability of reading and writing Japanese journals, papers engineering instruction manuals or reference materials. This course include:1.  papers reading practice2.  translation skill3.  technical writing

description.zh: 物聯網應用介紹、電腦與感測器資訊擷取傳輸、通訊協定與資訊安全
description.en: Introduction to Internet of Things applications, computer and sensor information acquisition and transmission, communication protocols and information security

name.en: Introduction to Internet of Things Applications

description.zh: 本課程之目的將探討酵素的功能及結構。針對醣類水解？水解各式各樣的多醣類做詳細探討。將目前已歸類的 96 家族中有晶體結構的家族中選出幾種家族做詳細的學習。從已發表文獻中來瞭解水解？可特定水解多醣類的特性。
description.en: This course will focus on glycoside hydrolases that hydrolyze various carbohydrates. Glycoside hydrolases have been classified to 96 families to date. The number of enzymes will be increase by time.

description.zh: 以實務性專題提供管理組學生獨立研究、設計、實驗之機會。
description.en: This course provides the students the opportunity to do the practical project independently.

description.zh: 本所與美國新罕布夏大學富蘭克林皮爾斯法學院，已於 112 年 5 月 10 日簽署國際學術交流 MOU，而本所為響應學校推動國際化之政策，特別增開 1 門 1 學分之國際雙師課程。本課程乃由美國新罕布夏大學富蘭克林皮爾斯法學院院長 Megan Carpenter 教授、該學院智慧財產權中心主任 Micky Minhas 教授親自來台密集授課，主要提供給欲深入了解美國法律制度、美國智慧財產權法律體系之本所學生、校外實務界人士或欲對赴美留學有興趣人士來選修。而本課程之內容，共分成兩個部分，前半部將以美國法律 (包括法院、普通法、各部門法律等) 之介紹為主，至於後半部則詳細介紹美國智慧財產權各部門法律 (包含著作權法、專利法、營業秘密法、資料保護、商標法等)。而本課程之開課時間，以每學年度上學期之 10 月上旬，並為期 1 週為原則。當然，本課程開設之目的，乃以增強學生實際應用英語之能力，並以加強學生美國智慧財產權法律之知能為主，除了強化本所與美國新罕布夏大學富蘭克林皮爾斯法學院之學術交流關係外，更能夠擴展休課學生之國際人脈及視野。
description.en: Graduate Institute of Intellectual Property, National Taipei University of Technology (hereafter called this institute) had made a MOU of international academic cooperation with Franklin Pierce School of Law, University of New Hampshire on May 10, 2023. This institute wants to promote the international policy from the University, so this institute will open a one unit course for international double professional teachers. This course is personally and intensively taught by Professor/Dean Megan Carpenter and Professor/Director Micky Minhas of Franklin Pierce School of Law, University of New Hampshire, and it is mainly provided for this institute’s students, legal practitioners, or someone who are interested in studying in the U.S. for further understanding the U.S. legal and intellectual property law systems. Moreover, contents of this course are divided into two parts: the former part is introductions of the U.S. laws, including courts, common laws, and all aspects of laws, etc. But,

name.zh: 美國智慧財產權法律專題
name.en: Seminar on the U.S. Intellectual Property Law

notes: 先鋒 1401 教室；國際雙師英文授課，預定 113/11/04-11/09

description.zh: 1. 微波傳輸線 2. 微波元件 3. 微波材料 4. 微波量測 5. 微波傳輸轉換 6. 微波耦合 7. 微波濾波器 8. 微波天線
description.en: 1.Microware Transmission Lines2.Microware Elements3.Microware Matericals4.Microware Measurements5.Microware Transitions6.Microware Couplers7.Microware Filters8.Microware Antennas

description.zh: 本課程係以商用繪圖 CAD 軟體（如 TCAD 或 ACAD 等）為教學範本，內容包括二維製圖，三維製圖，修訂功能表，命令腳本（Script）以及圖組 (Block)、圖形功能表等之製作，以輔助機械製圖為主要目標。
description.en: Use commercial CAD Software (e.g.: Turbo CAD or Auto CAD) as the Tuitional examples for Mechanical Drawings, including 2-D and 3-D drawings, to edit and to modify the Menu, Script and Block etc

description.zh: 介紹汽機車上各控制系統之硬體及控制策略，包含引擎系統之空燃比、怠速、冷起動、爆震、廢氣，傳動系統之變速、傳動，煞車系統之 ABS、TCS、SRS，懸吊系統之半主動及主動式懸吊，智慧型道路系統之頭燈、環境、巡航、跟隨、夜視等控制系統。
description.en: This course introduces hardware and control strategies used in each control systems in a vehicle.  These control systems include engine system (AF ratio, idle speed, cold start, knocking, exhaust), transmission system, brake system (ABS, TCS, SRS), suspension system (semi-active and active), intelligent transportation system (headlight, environment, cruise, following, night vision) etc..

description.zh: 本課程教授人工智慧技術的基礎理論與實務技巧，並對於人工智慧在製造業、服務業、金融業的應用，提供啟發性的基本認知與創意，以激發學生在人工智慧領域的創新應用。課程內容包括：人工智慧基礎、機器學習、大數據技術、深度學習、生成對抗網路、創業家思維、設計思考、商業模式、人工智慧與現代科技、工業 4.0、人工智慧的製造業應用個案、人工智慧的服務業應用個案、人工智慧的金融應用個案。
description.en: This course aims to teach students the basic concepts and practical techniques of artificial intelligence and to introduce its applications on manufacturing, service, and finance industries. The course focuses on inspring students for innovative artificial intelligence applications. The course includes: artificial intelligence basics, machine learn-ing, big data, deep learning, generative adversarial network, entrepreneurial thoughts, design thinking, business models, artificial intelligence and modern technologies, industry 4.0, real case applications on manufacturing, service, finance industries.

notes: (群組 3) 工業與科技管理 (關聯群 7)

description.zh: 資訊安全以全面觀點說明執行完整的資訊與通訊安全管理所需考量的各個層面，課程包括：資訊安全管理國際標準、資訊安全政策與組織、人力資源安全、資產管理、存取控制、密碼學與金鑰管理、實體與環境安全、作業與通訊管理 系統獲取、開發及維護、供應商管理、資訊安全事故管理、營運持續管理之資訊安全層面、制度及法規的遵循
description.en: Information Security provides a comprehensive view of information and communication security. This course content includes as follows: information security management international standards, information security policy and organization, human resource security, asset management, access control, cryptography and key management, physical and environmental security, operations and communication management system acquisition, development and maintenance, supplier management, information security incident management, operational sustainability management, information security aspects, systems and regulatory compliance.

description.zh: 本課程上半學期以 R 語言為工具，處理分析金融交易資料於股票期貨與選擇權等商品，包含理論模擬與實務分析。
description.en: In this course, we use R language as a tool to deal with the analysis of financial data in the stock, futures and options and other commodities, including theoretical simulation and practical analysis.

description.zh: 本課程是教導學生金融科技的基本概念，使學生能夠建立金融科技的創新應用。內容包括：金融科技概論、金融科技商業模式、P2P 借貸、虛擬貨幣、雲端服務、第三方支付、群眾募資、P2P 匯兌、區塊鏈、跨境電商、程式交易、機器人理財與期末專題製做。
description.en: This course is to instruct students the basic concepts of financial technology and to enable students to develop innovative applications of financial technology. The contents include introduction to financial technology, business models of financial technology, P2P lending, virtual money, third-party payment, crowd funding, P2P remittance, blockchain, cross-border e-commerce, program trading, and robotic financial advisory.

description.zh: 1. 學習診斷輔導方法 2. 培養學生現場診斷與輔導 3. 提升學生企業經營管理改善能力
description.en: 1. Learn diagnostic counseling methods2. Train students on-site diagnosis and counseling3. Enhance students' ability to improve business management

notes: (群組 6) 財金管理 (聯輔會) 修畢企業管理 & 經營策略實務

description.zh: 玄奘之路商學院戈壁挑戰賽緣起於 2006 年，秉承「玄奘之路」精神，倡導「理想、行動、堅持、超越」之理念，通過浸入式的身心體驗和團隊協作來達成個人心靈突破，並鼓勵參賽戈友相互扶持、共同進退，弘揚團隊合作、永不放棄的正向能量。
description.en: The Business Schools Xuanzang Road Gobi Challenge originated in 2006.This event adheres to the spirit of "Xuan Zang Road", advocates the concept of "idealism, action, persistence, and transcendence" to achieve personal spiritual breakthrough through immersive physical and mental experience and teamwork; Gobi challenge also promotes teamwork by encouraging all participants to support each other, to advance and retreat together, and be positive, never give up!

name.zh: 運動與休閒管理 - 戈壁挑戰賽
name.en: Sports and Leisure activity Management -Gobi Challenge

notes: (群組 8) 社會人文藝術與其他領域

description.zh: 本課程以哈佛個案教學方法進行，在每個個案討論當中，同時由行銷管理、財務管理、科技管理、生產管理領域老師教授。可以讓學生在學管理工功能之外，還可以學習這些管理功能的整合，學期末並有分組個案競賽，促進團隊互動與學習。
description.en: The Integrated Management Case Studies would be taught by case methods from Havard Business School’s cases.
