Every case will be taught from Marketing, Financing, Technology Management, and Operation Management areas faculty. This course focus on the integration of management functions. The case contest will be hold on the final week to encourage team building and learning.

description.zh: 此課程旨在說明決策理論之基本觀念，及其在真實世界裡相關決策問題之分析。使學生具備了解並建構決策問題，建構並推估決策之不確定性，以及建構並評估效用模式之能力。
description.en: This course provides an overview of the basic concepts of decision theory and their applications on the real-world decision problems. Students will learn about the problem identification and modeling, the modeling and estimation of the associated uncertainty, and modeling and evaluation of the utility function.

description.zh: 這門課程將深入探討 ESG 概念及其在國際趨勢中的地位，包括 CBAM、CCA、TCFD 等法規，亦將闡述國際評比、CSRD、IFRS S1/S2 等要求，以及國內主管機關的法規，尤其關於公司治理藍圖的要求。透過工作坊形式，我們將聚焦氣候變遷和財務相關揭露的重點，並以案例分享產業實務。從國際法規如 SB253、CBAM 到國際標準 ISO 20400，我們也將討論供應鏈管理和永續採購的趨勢。此外，將涵蓋人權相關議題，如 TIFD 和 DEI，以及永續報告書撰寫注意事項。最後，我們將介紹永續金融和責任投融資，並討論金融業永續法規對企業的影響。
description.en: This course explores ESG concepts and global trends like CBAM, CCA, and TCFD. We'll cover international ratings, CSRD, IFRS S1/S2, and domestic regulatory requirements, focusing on corporate governance. Through workshops and case studies, we'll highlight climate change and financial disclosures. We'll discuss supply chain management trends, ISO 20400, and human rights issues like TIFD and DEI. Additionally, we'll cover sustainability reporting guidelines and introduce sustainable finance and responsible investment, examining their impact on businesses and financial regulations.

name.zh: 永續發展與綠色金融管理
name.en: Sustainable Development and Green Banking Management

notes: (群組 6) 財金管理，台北上課 ( 溫紹)

description.zh: 本課程名稱為「運動追求卓越與個人健康管理」，是一門結合理論與實踐的課程，將透過探討運動科學與健康管理的基礎與實務參與，建構修課學生對運動在個人健康應用的實際體悟，並提升自我健康與體能管理，促進長期健康。課程內容涵蓋運動對健康的重要性、運動智能 APP、運動訓練安排、運動與營養、水分補充、傷害防護、運動與恢復等主題。透過本課程的學習，修課學生不僅能增進個人體能與相關運動知能， 並能由實務運動參與的過程，達到個人健康管理的益處。
description.en: This course “Exercise for excellent and health fitness management” combines theory and practice. By exploring the fundamentals of exercise science and health management, and through practical participation, it aims to build students' practical understanding of how exercise applies to personal health, and to enhance their self-health and physical fitness management to promote long-term health.The course covers topics such as the importance of exercise for health, exercise smart apps, training plan, exercise and nutrition, hydration, injury prevention, and recovery.Through this course, students will not only improve their physical fitness and sports-related knowledge but will also experience the benefits of personal health management through practical exercise participation.

name.zh: 運動追求卓越與個人健康管理
name.en: Exercise for excellent and health fitness management

notes: (群組 8) 社會人文藝術與其他領域，台北上課

description.zh: 本課程中包含下列主題：1. 簡介；2. 電子商店的行銷策略；3. 電子商店的建 置；4. 電子商店的經營與管理；5. 電子商店的法律問題；6. 案例介紹；7. 結論。
description.en: In the course, the following topics will be discussed：1.Overview of EC；2.The marketing strategies of EC；3.How to install an EC；4.The management of EC；5.The current problems of EC；6.Cases study；7.Conclusion.

description.zh: 本門課程是財務、電腦、與數學的結合，其主要目標為啟發學生如何設計電腦演算法來解決財務或經濟上的問題。一開始，此課程會複習一些基本的知識，如利率期間結構、選擇權評價理論、隨機過程模型、數值方法、與寫程式時所需的資料結構。之後，會講到一些新奇選擇權的演算法，包括亞洲式選擇權，障礙選擇權、回顧選擇權、重設選擇權、彩虹選擇權、可轉換公司債。
description.en: The major goal of this course is to provide students with complete understanding of many financial markets and products. Topics such as forward and futures, swaps, and options will be fully covered. In addition, the basic pricing methods of these innovative products will be emphasized in this course. Finally, even to a MBA student, the knowledge mentioned in this course is sure to be helpful for his (or her) future career.

notes: 【全英語】/ 資財四甲乙、資財所合開 / 科研 240

description.zh: 本課程的重點在於闡述管理學之基本概念，主要的內容涵蓋四個領域：(1) 瞭解管理學之理論與相關學者之研究報告；(2) 討論企業界管理應用實務案例；(3) 探討多國化管理之趨勢與差異及 (4) 如何落實管理理論研討與趨勢。另外一有管理相關功能實務應用之討論與介紹
description.en: The purpose of Management has four distinct objectives:(1) to introduce a new management paradigm；(2) to effectively combine the basic concepts of management and organizational behavior into a single volume, including the management functional and departmental descriptions；(3) to discuss business management applications in practice and (4) to effectively implement the management basic ideas. The planning, organization, decision, leadership and monitoring among variety culture will be covered and discussed in the class as well.

notes: 資財二甲乙合開 / 科研 235

description.zh: 組織行為是採用分析的方法，了解研究解個體行為在個人、團體、組織三個層次中的行為表現，並應用相關學理知識提高組織效能，尤其將焦點放在如何提高員工的生產力、降低離職率與曠職率，增加滿意度等四個變項上。
description.en: Organizational behavior (OB) is a field of research that investigates the impact that individuals, groups, and structure have on behavior within an organization, and then it applies that knowledge to make organizations work more effectively.  Specifically, OB focuses on how to improve productivity, reduce absenteeism and turnover, and increase employee citizenship and job satisfaction.

description.zh: 超低溫冷凍原理，超低溫冷凍系統設計簡介，氣體分離應用，液化氣體應用，低溫儀器，低溫冶金及低溫醫療。
description.en: Principles of cryogenic cooling, introduction to cryogenic cooling system design,gas separation applications, application in liquefied gases, low temperatureinstrumentation, low temperature metallurgy and cryomedical applications.

description.zh: 1. 靜電場理論：庫倫定律、高斯定律、電位能、電場能量與功、拉普勒斯方程式、邊界值間題、電容；  2. 靜磁場理論：直流電流、安培定律； 3. 電磁感應：法拉第定律、電機原理；4. 靜磁場理論：畢沙瓦特、安培定律、磁位能、磁場能量與功、強 磁性材料特性電感  5. 馬克思威爾方程式。
description.en: This is an introductory course of electromagnetics base on its Engineering applications. The course is divided into five parts :1.Static electric field  2.Steady electric current  3.Static magnetic field  4.Stationary electromagnetic field   5.Maxwell equations and their applications.  6.Besides, the course also introduces some of the optical technology.

description.zh: 論文寫作
description.en: Thesis writing

description.zh: 本課程主要在讓學生藉由規劃與實施一項公益活動，以實踐企業倫理與社會責任，並藉以思考在推展企業倫理、企業社會責任與公司治理等理念時，如何能落實於企業的體制之中，以建立一個永續發展的企業價值體系。
description.en: This course is designed to enable students to implement corporate ethics and social responsibility by planning and implementing a public welfare activity. The students should think about how to implement corporate ethics, corporate social responsibility, and corporate governance concepts. In order to establish a sustainable enterprise value system.

name.zh: 企業倫理與社會責任實踐
name.en: Corporate Ethics and Social Responsibility Practice

notes: 碩二必修，星期六 234，台北集中上課，USR 計畫

description.zh: 本課程之目的為訓練學生有關電子設備散熱設計之相關原理與技術。介紹各項電子元件之發熱量、溫度與元件穩定性之關係，熱對流、熱輻射等熱傳原理在電子設備散熱之的應用法則；解說電子設備散熱器之演進與設計原理，如：熱管之原理與演進、小型風散之特性與設計原則等。探討電子設備的熱阻抗分析、溫度計算、熱應力分析，並介紹相關電腦輔助分析軟體。
description.en: This course introduces principles and techniques of thermal management and cooling design of electronic equipments.  Subjects of this course include: thermal and physical properties of electronic components, thermo-fluid phenomena and principles of thermal management for electronic devices, and the evolution of cooling devices such as heat pipes and micro fans, discussion of analysis methodologies and computer software of thermal management problems including thermal resistances, temperature gradient, and thermal stress.

description.zh: 本課程大量的個案來說明企業管理的理論觀念以及分析方法，讓學生對企業管理有一定程度的了解，課程內容將以國內與國外著名案例為基礎，主題包括策略管理，行銷管理，組織領導，科技管理等。課程將採用參與式個案為教學方法，個案來源為哈佛商學院以及光華管理個案資料庫。
description.en: This course uses Harvard style case method to enhance MBA students' business concepts and theories. The topics include: strategy management, marketing management, leadership, and technology management. The case materials will be adapted from Harvard Business School and KMCC center.

description.zh: 國際商務市場行銷管理。包括在國際環境中的市場研究、定價、促銷和分銷。審查市場的問題出現不同程度的外資參與（出口，許可證，外國分公司）。先修課程：MARK5311 市場行銷。
description.en: Management of marketing in international business. Includes marketing research, pricing, promotion, and distribution in the international environment. Examines marketing problems arising from various degrees of foreign involvement (exports, licensing, foreign subsidiaries). Prerequisite: MARK 5311 (MARKETING).

description.zh: 國際商務市場行銷管理。包括在國際環境中的市場研究、定價、促銷和分銷。審查市場的問題出現不同程度的外資參與（出口，許可證，外國分公司）。先修課程：MARK5311 市場行銷。
description.en: Management of marketing in international business. Includes marketing research, pricing, promotion, and distribution in the international environment. Examines marketing problems arising from various degrees of foreign involvement (exports, licensing, foreign subsidiaries). Prerequisite: MARK 5311 (MARKETING).

description.zh: 本課程深入了解企業實現淨零碳排的原則與實踐。課程探討永續轉型的策略，著重於將永續性融入商業運營以及實現淨零排放的過程。透過理論知識與實務案例的結合，學生將學習如何在其組織內部開發和實施有效的永續策略。
description.en: This course provides an in-depth understanding of the principles and practices behind achieving net zero carbon emissions in a corporate setting. It explores the strategies for sustainable transformation, focusing on the integration of sustainability into business operations, and the journey towards achieving net zero emissions. Through a combination of theoretical knowledge and practical case studies, students will learn how to develop and implement effective sustainability strategies within their organizations.

name.zh: 企業淨零碳排與永續轉型
name.en: Corporate Net Zero Carbon Emissions and Sustainable Transformation

description.zh: 本課程在使學生藉由瞭解先進與科技產品發展與運用未來市場策略定位的領域有著密不可分的關係。課程內容主要藉由當前先進國家的科技產品發展的相關課題，以及我國身處整體環境的概述，讓同學進一步了解先進產業及企業之科技產品市場定位與策略有一基本的認知，提供同學從進階科技產品、市場定位、管理策略的課程用不同角度瞭解科技產品於市場上定位及推動發展策略。
description.en: This course is inseparable from the field of enabling students to understand the development of advanced and technological products and the application of future market strategy positioning. The content of the course mainly uses the current topics related to the development of technological products in advanced countries and an overview of the overall environment in which our country is located, so that students can further understand the market positioning and strategies of technological products of advanced industries and enterprises and have a basic understanding, and provide students with a basis for further study. Courses on high-end technology products, market positioning, and management strategies use different perspectives to understand the positioning of technology products in the market and promote development strategies.

name.zh: 進階科技產品市場定位與策略
name.en: Advanced technology product market positioning and strategy

description.zh: 本課程介紹電腦科學中圖形識別的基本原理與相關技術，使學生了解各種圖形識別的分類方法，經由對分類問題的分析，瞭解如何將輸入樣本依不同特性加以分類，並熟悉圖形識別系統之相關議題如：分割、特徵擷取、分類、後處理、訓練、監督 / 非監督式學習、機器學習，進而了解分類問題，增進其解決實際圖形識別分類問題的能力。課程內容包括下列課題：圖形識別概論，Bayesian Decision Theory, Maximum-Likelihood, 非參數法學習，K-Nearest Neighbor Estimation, The Nearest-Neighbor Rule, Positive Boolean Function 多分類器，Linear Discriminant Functions，高維資料分類，分類正確率評估 (Accuracy Assessments) 及其他重要的應用，例如：文件分析、生物辨識、影像監控、遙測影像分類、醫療診斷、資料探勘等概念，最後並透過相關論文的研讀及討論，了解近代圖形識別的最新發展趨勢。
description.en: The course includes: Introduction to Pattern Recognition, Bayesian Decision Theory, Maximum-Likelihood & Bayesian Parameter Estimation, Non-Parametric Classification - Density Estimation, K-Nearest Neighbor Estimation, The Nearest-Neighbor Rule, Multi-Classifier - Positive Boolean Function, Linear Discriminant Functions, Pattern Recognition of High Dimensional Data Sets, Pattern Recognition for Remote Sensing Images, Biometric Certification, Video Surveillance, Accuracy Assessments and Other Related Topics.

description.zh: 本課程主要分為專利權的觀念建立，及並以自然語言處理（NLP）作為主要工具，專利權進行量化分析。專利權部份：壹、保護創新：1. 如何透過專利保護科技創新、2. 專利的迷思。貳、專利與創新：1. 如何由需求或靈感取得創新、2. 如何使創新轉化為實質專利 3. 如何從專利撰寫演化出創新。參、專利概念與規法：1. 我國專利體系介紹、2. 專利相關法規之介紹、3. 專利取得的流程、4. 發明專利實體審查基、5. 專利說明書及圖示的撰寫格式、6. 何謂發明單一性及優先權的使用。肆、專利說明書搜尋及閱讀：1. 各國專利的搜尋引擎、2. 專利工具的使用、3. 閱讀專利說明書。伍、專利說明書的撰寫與申請：1. 專利說明書撰寫之重要 2. 專利說明書之格式 3. 專利說明書之撰寫技巧。陸、專利戰略與佈局：1. 商戰專利佈局模式、2. 專利舉發實務、3. 專利舉發方式、4. 專利舉發程序、5. 專利舉發策略運用、6. 舉發撤銷要件。柒、專利侵害及訴訟實例：1. 從案例中學習專利侵害的攻防與法院訴訟的爭點、2. 專家演講 (法官，技審官，審查官，律師) 邀請領域的專家分享實務經驗。專利權數據部份：壹、專利數據收集：深入探討數據清理，篩選，確保學生能夠為分析準備適當的數據集
description.en: Patent-related aspects include:1.	Protecting Innovation: Learn how to protect technological innovations through patents and debunk common myths surrounding patents.2.	Patent and Innovation: Understand how to derive innovation from demands or inspirations, turn innovations into substantial patents, and evolve innovations from patent writing.3.	Patent Concepts and Laws: Get introduced to the patent system in our country, learn about related regulations, understand the process of acquiring a patent, delve into invention patent review basics, and learn the format of writing patent specifications and illustrations. Furthermore, understand what constitutes an invention's singularity and the use of priority rights.4.	Searching and Reading Patent Specifications: Get accustomed to search engines of patents across various countries and patent tools, and learn how to read patent specifications.5.	Writing and Applying Patent Specifications: Understand the importance of patent specificati

description.zh: 本課程在介紹如何運用企業內與員工之有關資源，包括其能力、知識、技術、態度和激勵，以配合企業整體競爭策略與形式。其內容有：人力資源分析、策略及目標、支援性作業之取得、發展及報酬、人力資源的維護。
description.en: This course introduce how to apply the resource of the inter-corporation and employee, such as capacity, knowledge, technology, attitude and incentive, in order to cooperate business integrate competitive strategy.

notes: UTA, 碩二修，Dr. George Benson  中輔 7/28 , 正課 8.2-5

description.zh: 本課程以深入淺出之方式，介紹與機器學習之相關技術及演算法，目標是修習本課程之學生具有閱讀機器學習相關文獻之基本知識，並能從事相關之實務或電腦模擬實驗之工作，因此本課程著重在廣泛介紹各類之演算法之應用，而非深究少數演算法之深奧數學原理．本課程涵蓋之演算法，包含：最佳化基本知識，隨機最佳化演算法，隨機搜尋，決策樹，隨機森林，類神經網路及深度學習相關演算法，基因演算法，貝氏定理及應用，高斯混合模型，隱藏式馬可夫鍊 (及訓練演算法)，支援向量機，線性及邏輯迴歸，分群方法，降維方法，提升方法，決策融合技巧，及增強式學習等。
description.en: This introductory course covers most of the techniques and algorithms related to the current trend in the machine learning field. The goal of this course is that students complete this course can read and understand the literature in the machine learning field, and can conduct computer simulations for experiments or apply the techniques to practical problems. Therefore, this course intends to cover a broad range of algorithms with emphasis on applications, rather than to cover only a few algorithms with extensive mathematical treatments. The algorithms covered in this course include: foundations of optiminizations, random search, decision tree, random decision forests, neural networks and deep learning, genetic algorithm, Bayes' theorem and its applications, Gauss mixture model, hidden Markov model (with its training algorithm), support vector machine, linear and logistic regressions, clustering algorithms, dimension reduction techniques (LDA, PCA, ICA, FA), boosting methods, decision.

description.zh: 專注於戰略和機構的國際層面，並提供了一個框架，在日益複雜的全球經濟裡制定戰略。本課程旨在為學生提供對跨國公司經營裡的文化，政治，競爭，技術，法律和人口環境的理解。然後，它通過在國際背景下獲得成功的全球產業和戰略來探討全球競爭的性質。還涵蓋了跨國公司管理中的組織設計與戰略控制相關問題。
description.en: Focuses on the international dimensions of strategy and organization and provides a framework for formulating strategies in an increasingly complex global economy. The course seeks to provide students with an understanding of the cultural, political, competitive, technological, legal, and demographic environments in which multinational firms operate. It then examines the nature of global competition by exploring the characteristics of global industries and strategies that have been successful in an international context. Also covered are issues related to organizational design and strategic control in the management of multinational enterprises.

description.zh: 戰略管理使用綜合管理視角去解決相關的制定和實施企業和企業級戰略的問題。該課程包括開發識別問題的能力，評估戰略選擇，並瞭解戰略的形成和執行的組織過程。它建立在功能區課程所獲得的知識，並使用案例研究和項目，以提高學生的分析和決策能力。前提：必須參與上學期的課程或與得到研究生導師的許可。
description.en: Strategic management uses a general management perspective in addressing issues related to the formulation and implementation of corporate and business level strategy. The course involves developing the ability to identify issues, evaluate strategic options and understand the organizational process by which strategies get formed and executed. It builds on the knowledge gained in functional area courses and uses case studies and projects to improve students' analytical and decision-making skills. Prerequisite: Must be taken in last semester or with permission of the Graduate Advisor.

description.zh: 專注於戰略和機構的國際層面，並提供了一個框架，在日益複雜的全球經濟裡制定戰略。本課程旨在為學生提供對跨國公司經營裡的文化，政治，競爭，技術，法律和人口環境的理解。然後，它通過在國際背景下獲得成功的全球產業和戰略來探討全球競爭的性質。還涵蓋了跨國公司管理中的組織設計與戰略控制相關問題。
description.en: Focuses on the international dimensions of strategy and organization and provides a framework for formulating strategies in an increasingly complex global economy. The course seeks to provide students with an understanding of the cultural, political, competitive, technological, legal, and demographic environments in which multinational firms operate. It then examines the nature of global competition by exploring the characteristics of global industries and strategies that have been successful in an international context. Also covered are issues related to organizational design and strategic control in the management of multinational enterprises.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹高階管理的理論與實務。將透過學校老師與企業高階管理者與學生一起探討當前管理重要議題。本課程以哈佛個案教學方法進行，在每個個案討論當中，同時由行銷管理、財務管理、科技管理、生產管理領域老師教授。可以讓學生在學管理工功能之外，還可以學習這些管理功能的整合，學期末並有分組個案競賽，促進團隊互動與學習。
description.en: This course focuses on the introduction and discussion of theories and practices of contemporary management topics. Besides university professors, renowned top manager will be invited to share the best practice experiences of the workplace in the lecture. The Integrated Management Case Studies would be taught by case methods from Havard Business School’s cases. Every case will be taught from Marketing, Financing, Technology Management, and Operation Management areas faculty. This course focus on the integration of management functions. The case contest will be hold on the final week to encourage team building and learning.

name.en: Advanced Management Practice and Integrated Management Case Studies

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹高階管理的理論與實務。將透過學校老師與企業高階管理者與學生一起探討當前管理重要議題。本課程以哈佛個案教學方法進行，在每個個案討論當中，同時由行銷管理、財務管理、科技管理、生產管理領域老師教授。可以讓學生在學管理工功能之外，還可以學習這些管理功能的整合，學期末並有分組個案競賽，促進團隊互動與學習。
description.en: This course focuses on the introduction and discussion of theories and practices of contemporary management topics. Besides university professors, renowned top manager will be invited to share the best practice experiences of the workplace in the lecture. The Integrated Management Case Studies would be taught by case methods from Havard Business School’s cases. Every case will be taught from Marketing, Financing, Technology Management, and Operation Management areas faculty. This course focus on the integration of management functions. The case contest will be hold on the final week to encourage team building and learning.

name.en: Advanced Management Practice and Integrated Management Case Studies
